original: @232a * // rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa'i tshogs rnams spros te /
analyzed: @232a * // rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa'i tshogs rnams spros te /
translated: Having emanated the hosts of Vairocana, Amitābha, and Akṣobhya,

original: de rnams kyi grong khyer la sogs pa'i sa bzhi kun du bkang la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi grong khyer la sogs pa'i sa bzhi kun du bkang la /
translated: they fill all the four continents, such as Jambudvīpa,

original: sa 'og gi bar du sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab rnams las grub par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'og gi bar du sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab rnams las grub par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and one should imagine that they are established in the atoms of the vajra body, etc., down to the underworld.

original: de ltar bsgoms pas grong khyer la sogs pa'i gnas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pas grong khyer la sogs pa'i gnas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By meditating in this way, the places such as the continents will be blessed by all the buddhas for the duration of three incalculable aeons.

original: 'di de zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di de zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: This is what was just explained.

original: sems can gyi lus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi lus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o //
translated: The secret body is the faultless one, since it is the agent that removes all the afflictions from the bodies of sentient beings.

original: gang la sems can thams cad kyi nad med par byed pa yod pa de nyid rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la sems can thams cad kyi nad med par byed pa yod pa de nyid rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is the agent that removes the illnesses of all sentient beings is called “indivisible like a vajra,” since it is indivisible.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With respect to one who is engaged in the cultivation of the creation stage,

original: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam gtan las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam gtan las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “The protection wheel arises from meditative stabilization,” and so forth.

original: bsam gtan las byung zhing skyes pas na bsam gtan las byung ba ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan las byung zhing skyes pas na bsam gtan las byung ba ste /
translated: Arising from meditative stabilization is “arising from meditative stabilization.”

original: srung ba'i 'khor lo yin zhing de yis so //
analyzed: srung ba'i 'khor lo yin zhing de yis so //
translated: It is the protection wheel, and by that.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i dbang gi bdag po gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pas bgegs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa bskyed par par mi bya zhing nges par bya ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i dbang gi bdag po gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pas bgegs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa bskyed par par mi bya zhing nges par bya ste /
translated: The lord of yogins, abiding in the primordial non-arising of all things, the pure state, should not generate, should not produce, different conceptual thoughts of obstructors, and so forth.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par thun bzhir bsgom pa dam bcas pa gnas gang du spyod pa na /
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par thun bzhir bsgom pa dam bcas pa gnas gang du spyod pa na /
translated: In whatever place he practices, he should be committed to the uninterrupted cultivation in four sessions.

original: 'di yis zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas dang / sgrub pa po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yis zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas dang / sgrub pa po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the place of the yoga of the protection wheel, which will be explained, and the practitioner will be blessed by all the buddhas.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: The vajra nectar and so forth indicate the following.

original: sgrub thabs las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du zhe sdang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod mdzes rgyal po phyung ste /
analyzed: sgrub thabs las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du zhe sdang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod mdzes rgyal po phyung ste /
translated: Endowed with the yoga of Hatred Vajra, one should extract the King of the Fearful Ones in accordance with the ritual explained in the means of achievement.

original: de la bka' bsgos nas /
analyzed: de la bka' bsgos nas /
translated: Having given him orders,

original: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug ste /
translated: one should summon the hosts of obstructors such as Vishnu who dwell in the ten directions.

original: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bkod la bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i khro bo bcu smad phur bu'i rnam pa can 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis mdangs bzang po dang ldan pa phyung ste /
analyzed: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bkod la bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i khro bo bcu smad phur bu'i rnam pa can 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis mdangs bzang po dang ldan pa phyung ste /
translated: Having arranged them in their proper places, one should extract the ten wrathful ones called nectar, who have the form of lower daggers and are endowed with good radiance.

original: dpal gnod mdzes rgyal pos lag pa g-yon pas bzung zhing /
analyzed: dpal gnod mdzes rgyal pos lag pa g-yon pas bzung zhing /
translated: The glorious King of the Fearful Ones should hold them with his left hand.

original: aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bkas @232b lag pa g-yas pa na thogs pa'i rdo rje tho bas brdungs nas mgo bo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar du bgegs thams cad phur bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bkas @232b lag pa g-yas pa na thogs pa'i rdo rje tho bas brdungs nas mgo bo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar du bgegs thams cad phur bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: With the words Om gha gha and so forth, he should strike with the vajra hammer held in his right hand, beginning with the head and ending with the feet, and should drive in the stakes of all the obstructors.

original: 'gro ba ste bgegs kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi khams 'dul ba ni phur bus gdab pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba ste bgegs kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi khams 'dul ba ni phur bus gdab pa ste /
translated: The realm of sentient beings, which is the nature of the host of obstructors, is to be tamed, which is driven in with the stakes.

original: gang la des zhi ba mi phyed par 'gyur ba yod pa de la skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la des zhi ba mi phyed par 'gyur ba yod pa de la skad ces bya'o //
translated: Where there is peace that is not divided, that is called peace.

original: zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
translated: In peace, the method of the eyes.

original: zhes bya ba'i mdo dang da'i bshad pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mdo dang da'i bshad pa /
translated: The sutra and its commentary say:

original: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The peaceful maṇḍala and so forth.

original: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chu'i dkyil 'khor yin zhing de nyid dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chu'i dkyil 'khor yin zhing de nyid dam pa'o //
translated: The peaceful maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of water with the previously explained characteristics, and that itself is supreme.

original: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas //
translated: Having contemplated the form of Vairocana,

original: rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: placing the desired one in one's heart, and so forth.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: sngar bshad pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas spyan gyi chos 'byung gi nang na gnas pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas spyan gyi chos 'byung gi nang na gnas pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste /
translated: In accordance with the previously explained method, in the center of the body mandala that is located within the phenomena source of Buddhalocanā, one should imagine oneself as Vairocana with three faces and four arms, standing on a moon seat upon a lotus, seated on the previously explained water maṇḍala.

original: da dag nyid rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad sku dang zhal gsum sku mdog dkar po zhi ba'i ngang can shin tu snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa dkar zhing zhi ba'i ngang can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor bar rnam par bsams
analyzed: da dag nyid rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad sku dang zhal gsum sku mdog dkar po zhi ba'i ngang can shin tu snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa dkar zhing zhi ba'i ngang can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor bar rnam par bsams
translated: One should imagine oneself as Vairocana with a consort, with three faces and four arms, white in color, peaceful in aspect, and overcome with passion, surrounded by the four tathāgatas, who are white and peaceful in aspect.

original: nas / ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar padma'i steng gi zla ba la bsgrub bya dang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyi phreng ba mgo gyen du bltas pa mdog dkar po bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsgrub bya'i lus kun du khyab par byed pa rnam par bkod la /
analyzed: nas / ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar padma'i steng gi zla ba la bsgrub bya dang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyi phreng ba mgo gyen du bltas pa mdog dkar po bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsgrub bya'i lus kun du khyab par byed pa rnam par bkod la /
translated: At the heart of the gnosis being is a moon on a lotus, on which is the object of the ritual, surrounded by the mantra string of Buddhalocanā, white in color and dripping nectar, which pervades the entire body of the object of the ritual.

original: de'i rnam par shes pa gzhug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i rtags dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings kun du gang bar bltas te /
analyzed: de'i rnam par shes pa gzhug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i rtags dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings kun du gang bar bltas te /
translated: Visualize that the space element is completely filled with Buddhalocanās endowed with the signs and characteristics that emerge from the door of light rays, preceded by the entry of the consciousness.

original: sngags las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis gnas nas bkug la snga ma bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i tshul gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: sngags las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis gnas nas bkug la snga ma bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i tshul gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la bcug ste /
translated: The hooks of light rays that emerge from the mantra draw the object of the ritual from his abode and, as before, insert him into the body of the object of the ritual in the manner of conferring empowerment with the vase and so forth.

original: slar sangs rgyas spyan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rtag pa rnams spros la /
analyzed: slar sangs rgyas spyan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rtag pa rnams spros la /
translated: Again emanate the Buddhalocanās and the hooks of light rays.

original: de kho na bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer initiation just as it is.

original: des ni bsgrub bya mi phyed pa'i sku can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni bsgrub bya mi phyed pa'i sku can du 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, the one to be accomplished becomes one whose body is indivisible.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //🔽dam tshig gi sgras ni sangs rgyas @233a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do // dam tshig gi sgras ni sangs rgyas @233a * //
translated: Buddha is Vairochana.

original: spyan te gang la de dag gi bkod pa'i sprin gyis zhi bar bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: spyan te gang la de dag gi bkod pa'i sprin gyis zhi bar bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The word pledge is Buddha Locana, and that which has the cloud-array of those for the purpose of pacifying is so-called.

original: rgyas la padmo rdo rje can //
analyzed: rgyas la padmo rdo rje can //
translated: For enrichment, the lotus has a vajra.

original: zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa /
translated: The meaning of the verse is explained.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The moon disk, etc.

original: rin po che'i dam tshig gis bha gar rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rin po che'i dam tshig gis bha gar rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: In the bhaga of the jewel pledge, in the center of the jewel mandala, on the lotus of the moon seat, in the center of the great dominion mandala, which has the characteristics explained above, one should visualize the syllable tam, which is the nature of all the Buddhas.

original: de nyid dge legs thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dge legs thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dam pa'o //
translated: That is excellent because it is the attainment of auspiciousness.

original: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa gos dkar mo'i gzugs su gyur ba yin zhing /
analyzed: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa gos dkar mo'i gzugs su gyur ba yin zhing /
translated: Dharma is Amitābha, who becomes the form of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: de snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas 'dzin par byed pas na chos 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas 'dzin par byed pas na chos 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Since one holds her by means of meditative concentration, she is the “holder of the Dharma.”🔽Together with the knowledge consort, he is yellow in color, and his mind is vast, as before.

original: rig ma dang bcas pa sku mdog ser po thugs rgya che ba snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: rig ma dang bcas pa sku mdog ser po thugs rgya che ba snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: In the center of the four tathāgatas, he is Ratnasambhava.

original: snying gar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rang bzhin du gos dkar mo'i sngags kyi phreng bas kun du bskor ba'o //
analyzed: snying gar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rang bzhin du gos dkar mo'i sngags kyi phreng bas kun du bskor ba'o //
translated: “ Desire at the heart” means that, in the nature just explained, one is completely surrounded by the rosary of Pāṇḍaravāsinī’s mantra.

original: dkar mo zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog dbal dang ldan pa'i gos dkar mo sku mdog sor rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang ste bsdus nas sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du kun du sbyar te /
analyzed: dkar mo zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog dbal dang ldan pa'i gos dkar mo sku mdog sor rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang ste bsdus nas sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du kun du sbyar te /
translated: “ White” means that, having filled the whole sky with the light of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, one should gather it and unite it, as with Buddhalocanā.

original: lus la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: lus la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should cause it to enter one’s body.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa la de dbab par bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa la de dbab par bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “One should cause it to descend into the desire.”

original: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga'i gseb nas byung ba'i dkon mchog dpal gyi chogs gos dkar mo dang yang dag par ldan pa yang spros la /
analyzed: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga'i gseb nas byung ba'i dkon mchog dpal gyi chogs gos dkar mo dang yang dag par ldan pa yang spros la /
translated: One should imagine that the cloud of Ratnaprabha, which has come forth from the pores of one's own body, is united with Pāṇḍaravāsinī,

original: bsdus te de kho na bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang rjes su zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bsdus te de kho na bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang rjes su zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and that it is condensed and that the initiation is conferred just as before, and that one enters into it.

original: 'di yis zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pas so //
analyzed: 'di yis zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pas so //
translated: By this means by what has just been explained.

original: dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs //
analyzed: dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs //
translated: One should fill even the hard-to-fill.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained.

original: chos ni gos dkar mo /
analyzed: chos ni gos dkar mo /
translated: The Dharma is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: dam tshig ni dkon mchog dbal te /
analyzed: dam tshig ni dkon mchog dbal te /
translated: The pledge is Ratnaprabha.

original: gang la de dag gi sprin bkod pa dag gis rgyas par byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la de dag gi sprin bkod pa dag gis rgyas par byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has the array of clouds of those two is so called.

original: dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
analyzed: dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
translated: Vairocana is in the initiation.

original: zhes bya ba mdo de'i don ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba mdo de'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of this verse is as follows.

original: nam mkha' dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha' dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In the sky realm, etc.

original: gos dkar mo'i mtsho skyes su gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan la'o //
analyzed: gos dkar mo'i mtsho skyes su gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi zla ba'i gdan la'o //
translated: means on the moon seat on the lotus in the middle of the speech mandala of the lake-born one, Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor ni yi ge bam las byung ba'i gzhu'i rnam pa can gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdul phra rab dmar @233b po g-yo ba'i rang bzhin can rdo rje'i spyan gyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor ni yi ge bam las byung ba'i gzhu'i rnam pa can gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdul phra rab dmar @233b po g-yo ba'i rang bzhin can rdo rje'i spyan gyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: The vajra half-moon maṇḍala is the air maṇḍala arisen from the syllable vaṃ, in the form of a bow, with a subtle particle of red, the nature of movement, marked with a vajra eye.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The vajra space, etc.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni lha mo rdo rje nam mkha' ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni lha mo rdo rje nam mkha' ma'o //
translated: The vajra space is the goddess Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: chos mchog ni de dang yang dag par ldan pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: chos mchog ni de dang yang dag par ldan pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The supreme quality is Amitābha endowed with that.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pa'i gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pa'i gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'o //
translated: The desire is the supplication for the subjugation of all beings.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa rnams so //
translated: The buddhas are the Amitābha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yis zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi m'a ma k'i'i gzugs rnams kyis te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yis zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi m'a ma k'i'i gzugs rnams kyis te /
translated: The bodhisattvas are the forms of Māmakī of the jewel family.

original: 'di nyid las byang chub sems dpa' chu rdo rje dang zhes bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid las byang chub sems dpa' chu rdo rje dang zhes bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The bodhisattva is the water vajra.

original: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the five lights,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is taught:

original: bdag nyid ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa sku mdog dmar skya kun du chags pa'i thugs mnga' ba snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor ba rig dang bcas pa'i 'od dpag tu med par bsams la /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa sku mdog dmar skya kun du chags pa'i thugs mnga' ba snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor ba rig dang bcas pa'i 'od dpag tu med par bsams la /
translated: One should visualize oneself as the color of pale red, abiding in the maṇḍala as explained, with an attitude of passion, surrounded by the four tathāgatas as before, together with Amitābha and his consort.

original: snga ma bzhin du 'dod pa m'a ma k'i sngags kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bltas te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du 'dod pa m'a ma k'i sngags kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bltas te /
translated: As before, one should visualize the garland of the Mañjuśrī mantra surrounding [the deity].

original: sngags las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba spros pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i m'a ma k'i dmar po'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la /
analyzed: sngags las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba spros pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i m'a ma k'i dmar po'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la /
translated: From the door of the light rays arising from the mantra, one should visualize the sky filled with a multitude of red Mañjuśrī in union with Amitābha, who are emanated by the light rays.

original: de rnams kyis de la bum pa dmar po'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis de la bum pa dmar po'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur te /
translated: They confer empowerment upon him with the nectar of the red vase.

original: 'dod chags kyi mes 'bar ba la 'od zer lngas khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun kha dog dmar po rnams dbang bskur la /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi mes 'bar ba la 'od zer lngas khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun kha dog dmar po rnams dbang bskur la /
translated: The stream of bodhicitta, which is pervaded by the five lights, is conferred with empowerment upon the blazing fire of passion.

original: m'a ma k'i'i tshogs zhu bar gyur ba zhugs pas dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i'i tshogs zhu bar gyur ba zhugs pas dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
translated: The assembly of Māmakī melts and enters, and one should be empowered.

original: de bzhin du rang gi ba spu'i rtse mo las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi ba spu'i rtse mo las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should be empowered by the assembly of Amitābha, which arises from one’s pores.

original: de ni zhes bya ba dbang du bya ba don du gnyer ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba dbang du bya ba don du gnyer ba'o //
translated: “That” is the one who is desirous of being empowered.

original: de ma thag tu ste sems brten pa'i rnal 'byor bas mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes thogs nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang 'dra ba'i sku dang ldan pa dang / bltas pa tsam gyis 'gro ba thams cad dbang du bya ba'i las byed par dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ma thag tu ste sems brten pa'i rnal 'byor bas mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes thogs nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang 'dra ba'i sku dang ldan pa dang / bltas pa tsam gyis 'gro ba thams cad dbang du bya ba'i las byed par dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Immediately, that is, right after the yoga of stabilizing the mind, one becomes the mind of all the Buddhas, one has a body like the noble Mañjuśrī, and one is empowered to perform the action of magnetizing all beings just by looking at them.

original: de'i phyir bltas pa tsam gyis bskul na /🔽'gro ba @234a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir bltas pa tsam gyis bskul na / 'gro ba @234a * //
translated: Therefore, if one merely looks,

original: thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: all beings will be magnetized.

original: rin po che zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi lha mo chen mo'o //
analyzed: rin po che zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi lha mo chen mo'o //
translated: The “jewel” is the great goddess of the jewel family.

original: dam tshig ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: The “pledge” is Amitābha.

original: gang la de dag gi sprin bkod pa dag gis dbang du bya bar nus pa'i don byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la de dag gi sprin bkod pa dag gis dbang du bya bar nus pa'i don byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has the ability to perform the action of magnetizing by means of the cloud-like array of those deities is called that.

original: sngar ni rdo rje'i rigs gtso bor byas pa'i sgo nas spyod pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar ni rdo rje'i rigs gtso bor byas pa'i sgo nas spyod pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: Previously, the conduct was taught from the perspective of the vajra family being primary.

original: da ni las kyi tshogs kyi go rims kyi sgo nas nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni las kyi tshogs kyi go rims kyi sgo nas nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
translated: Now, from the perspective of the sequence of the assembly of activities, the Bhagavān declares “space vajra,” and so on.

original: m'a ma k'i'i padma'i nang na gnas pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan gyi dbus su bdag nyid yi ge ram las byung ba'i nam mkha' lta bu'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba'i yi ge ram gyis mtshan pa
analyzed: m'a ma k'i'i padma'i nang na gnas pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan gyi dbus su bdag nyid yi ge ram las byung ba'i nam mkha' lta bu'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba'i yi ge ram gyis mtshan pa
translated: In the center of the mind maṇḍala located in the lotus of Māmakī, on the lotus in the center of the sun seat, oneself arises from the syllable raṃ as a fire maṇḍala like space, triangular, blazing, marked with the syllable raṃ,

original: la bzhugs pa rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs pa'i mi bskyod par rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: la bzhugs pa rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs pa'i mi bskyod par rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: upon which is a moon, upon which is a blue hūṃ, which becomes oneself as Akṣobhya, similar to Great Vajradhara.

original: de kho na bzhin du sdig pa bsags pa kha sbyar phye bar gyur pa 'jigs pas myos pa mdun na gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa gcer bu skar grol ba lus til mar gyis bskus pa'i bsgrub bya dmigs te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du sdig pa bsags pa kha sbyar phye bar gyur pa 'jigs pas myos pa mdun na gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa gcer bu skar grol ba lus til mar gyis bskus pa'i bsgrub bya dmigs te /
translated: Just so, one should visualize the victim, who has accumulated evil, his mouth opened by force, his eyes rolling in fear, standing in front of a circle of fire, naked, hair disheveled, his body smeared with oil.

original: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sgo las spros pa'i rdo rje srin po drag po mi bzad pa rnams dang ces spyang dang bya rog dang bya rgod pa dang khyi rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings kun du bkang
analyzed: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sgo las spros pa'i rdo rje srin po drag po mi bzad pa rnams dang ces spyang dang bya rog dang bya rgod pa dang khyi rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings kun du bkang
translated: One should imagine that the sky is filled with terrible, unbearable vajra-rākṣasas, emanated from the doors of the light rays that come from one's pores, and with various kinds of wolves, crows, vultures, and dogs,

original: la / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i khro bo rnams kyis mnan te dum bur byas shing srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis khrag dang glad pa la sogs pa phyung nas zos par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: la / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i khro bo rnams kyis mnan te dum bur byas shing srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis khrag dang glad pa la sogs pa phyung nas zos par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and that the victim is crushed and cut to pieces by wrathful deities bearing various weapons, and that rākṣasas and so forth pull out his blood and brain and eat them.

original: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: If one does this, and so on,

original: phul du byung ba ma thob pas kyang bsgom pa 'di'i sbyor bas kha sbyar phye bar gyur nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa yin yang zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phul du byung ba ma thob pas kyang bsgom pa 'di'i sbyor bas kha sbyar phye bar gyur nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa yin yang zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even if one does not attain the excellent, by the application of this meditation, the union is opened, and even the Buddhas, etc. will certainly die within a fortnight.🔽This is the meaning.

original: gang la rdo rje srin po la sogs pa'i sprin bkod pa rnams kyis mngon spyod bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la rdo rje srin po la sogs pa'i sprin bkod pa rnams kyis mngon spyod bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has the cloud-array of Vajrarakshasas, etc. is to be acted against by the rite of destruction.

original: sngar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir kha dog la sogs pa bshad cing /
analyzed: sngar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir kha dog la sogs pa bshad cing /
translated: Previously, the colors, etc. were explained in order to teach the emanation mandala of the Bodhisattvas.

original: nga ni rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
analyzed: nga ni rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
translated: Now, in terms of the yogi's meditation, it is taught by Vairochana, etc.

original: de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ni bshad zin to //
translated: That has been explained.

original: 'khor lo rdo rje padmo che /
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje padmo che /
translated: The great wheel, vajra, and lotus

original: g-yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom //
translated: are meditated on in the right hand.

original: @234b zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @234b zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na 'khor lo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na 'khor lo //
translated: Vairochana's right primary hand holds a wheel.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje /
translated: Akṣobhya’s is the vajra.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ni padma chen po'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ni padma chen po'o //
translated: Amitābha’s is the great lotus.

original: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: This is the indication.🔽Ratnasaṃbhava’s is the jewel.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na rin po che don yod par grub pa'i ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na rin po che don yod par grub pa'i ni ral gri'o //
translated: Amoghasiddhi’s is the sword.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi don ston par byed pa'i dril bu'i sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can ni lha thams cad kyi g-yon pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag tu blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi don ston par byed pa'i dril bu'i sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can ni lha thams cad kyi g-yon pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag tu blta bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the nature of wisdom, which follows the sound of the bell that teaches the meaning of the wisdom of differentiation, is in the left hand of all the deities.

original: mtshon cha bzang po sna tshogs bsnams pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga lha thams cad dang thun mong du shes rab ye shes kyi don ston par byed cing rnam par thar ba drug gi bdag nyid kyi phyag mtshan drug bsnams pa yin no
analyzed: mtshon cha bzang po sna tshogs bsnams pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga lha thams cad dang thun mong du shes rab ye shes kyi don ston par byed cing rnam par thar ba drug gi bdag nyid kyi phyag mtshan drug bsnams pa yin no
translated: “Holding various excellent weapons” indicates that the five tathāgatas, in common with all the deities, teach the meaning of the wisdom of gnosis and hold the six symbolic implements that are the nature of the six liberations.

original: zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching.

original: 'on kyang rgyud ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtso bor gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sku rdo rje'i phyag g-yas pa rnams na ni 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyud ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtso bor gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sku rdo rje'i phyag g-yas pa rnams na ni 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma'o //
translated: However, the tantra is primarily the body, speech, and mind, so in the right hands of the Body Vajra are a wheel, a vajra, and a lotus.

original: thugs rdo rje'i ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang chu skyes so //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'i ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang chu skyes so //
translated: In the mind vajra's hands are a vajra, a wheel, and a lotus.

original: gsung rdo rje'i ni padma dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje'i ni padma dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo'o //
translated: In the speech vajra's hands are a lotus, a vajra, and a wheel.

original: g-yon pa rnams na ni dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa rnams na ni dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri'o //
translated: In the left hands are a bell, a wish-fulfilling jewel, and a sword.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yas pa rnams na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yas pa rnams na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo /
translated: In the right hands of Ratnasaṃbhava are a wish-fulfilling jewel, a vajra, and a wheel.

original: g-yon pa'i gnyis pas ni padma'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i gnyis pas ni padma'o //
translated: In the second left hand is a lotus.

original: de bzhin don yod par grub pa'i g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na ni ral gri /
analyzed: de bzhin don yod par grub pa'i g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na ni ral gri /
translated: Similarly, in the right hands of Amoghasiddhi are a sword,

original: gnyis pa na ni sna tshogs rdo rje /
analyzed: gnyis pa na ni sna tshogs rdo rje /
translated: in the second a crossed vajra,

original: g-yon pa'i gsum pa na ni padma'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i gsum pa na ni padma'o //
translated: and in the third left hand a lotus.

original: de bzhin du rigs kyi dbye ba'i sgo nas thams cad la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rigs kyi dbye ba'i sgo nas thams cad la shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand all the distinctions of the families.

original: gang du khyad par gyi gnod pa med pa der ni par bu chos gos 'khar gsil dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa //
analyzed: gang du khyad par gyi gnod pa med pa der ni par bu chos gos 'khar gsil dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa //
translated: Where there is no special harm, there is the cloth, the Dharma robe, the staff, and the various weapons.

original: zhes bya ba la de lta bu la sogs pa bzung nas yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de lta bu la sogs pa bzung nas yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having taken up such things, one will again be successful.

original: sku dang gsung thugs sbyor ba las //
analyzed: sku dang gsung thugs sbyor ba las //
translated: From the union of body, speech, and mind,

original: lha rnams thams cad zhal gsum mo //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad zhal gsum mo //
translated: all the deities have three faces.

original: rnam thar brgyad kyi rang bzhin phyir //
analyzed: rnam thar brgyad kyi rang bzhin phyir //
translated: Because of the nature of the eight liberations,

original: de bzhin phyag mtshan thams cad bsnams //
analyzed: de bzhin phyag mtshan thams cad bsnams //
translated: they all hold the hand implements.

original: rigs gsum gtso bor gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rigs gsum gtso bor gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of being the chief of the three families,

original: rdo rje 'khor lo chu skyes ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo chu skyes ni //
translated: the vajra, wheel, and lotus

original: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams bsnams pa yin //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams bsnams pa yin //
translated: are held in the right hands.

original: don gyes g-yon na lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: don gyes g-yon na lhag ma rnams //
translated: The remaining ones in the left

original: phyag mtshan du ma bsnams pa nyid //
analyzed: phyag mtshan du ma bsnams pa nyid //
translated: hold the many hand implements.

original: kun du so sor grub pa yin //
analyzed: kun du so sor grub pa yin //
translated: They are all individually accomplished.

original: gzhung gi don dang man ngag las //
analyzed: gzhung gi don dang man ngag las //
translated: From the meaning of the text and the esoteric instructions,

original: @235a * // ral gri g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: @235a * // ral gri g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams //
translated: the sword is held in the left hand.

original: tha mal pa yi sems can yang //
analyzed: tha mal pa yi sems can yang //
translated: Even ordinary sentient beings

original: g-yon pas ral gri 'dzin par snang //
analyzed: g-yon pas ral gri 'dzin par snang //
translated: appear to hold the sword in the left hand.

original: de rnams bya ba'ang byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams bya ba'ang byed pa ste /
translated: And they are also the performance of actions.

original: goms pa'i sgo nas bya min med //
analyzed: goms pa'i sgo nas bya min med //
translated: There is nothing that is not to be done by way of practice.

original: shin tu spros pas cho ga go //
analyzed: shin tu spros pas cho ga go //
translated: The ritual is very elaborate.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang //
translated: The Lord also says:

original: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
translated: The treasure of all powers

original: dgongs pa lung bstan la brten nas //
analyzed: dgongs pa lung bstan la brten nas //
translated: is based on the explanation of the intention.

original: gang gi sems kyis ji ltar nus //
analyzed: gang gi sems kyis ji ltar nus //
translated: Whatever one is able to do with one's mind,

original: de yis de ltar bya ba yin //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de yis de ltar bya ba yin // zhes gsungs te /
translated: that one should do.

original: bdag gi nus pa yang de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi nus pa yang de lta bu yin no //
translated: Thus, my ability is like this.

original: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: All sentient beings and so forth are easy to understand.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni dkon mchog dpal lo //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni dkon mchog dpal lo //
translated: Space-vajra is Ratnasambhava.

original: de'i spyan ni shes rab kyi spyan du gyur pa'am rang gi rig sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa rdo rje'i gnas su khrid par byed pas so //
analyzed: de'i spyan ni shes rab kyi spyan du gyur pa'am rang gi rig sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa rdo rje'i gnas su khrid par byed pas so //
translated: His eye is the eye of wisdom, or it is the eye of one's own awareness, because it leads the yogin to the abode of the vajra.

original: 'di ni dus 'dir mdog ser po yin no zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dus 'dir mdog ser po yin no zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
translated: This is the instruction: At this time, it is yellow.

original: gnag ces bya ba mi bskyod pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: gnag ces bya ba mi bskyod pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i dus su'o //
translated: Black is at the time of the union with Akṣobhya.

original: de'i phyir m'a ma k'i 'di ni rigs gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir m'a ma k'i 'di ni rigs gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Therefore, this Māmakī is of the nature of two families.

original: gsung gi spyan ni bshad ma thag pa bzhin du dkar mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsung gi spyan ni bshad ma thag pa bzhin du dkar mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The eye of speech is the white one, as just explained.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i autpala rdo rje autpala yin zhing /
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i autpala rdo rje autpala yin zhing /
translated: The vajra-marked utpala is the vajra utpala.

original: der 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje autpala bsnams pa ste /
analyzed: der 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje autpala bsnams pa ste /
translated: Because it holds that, it holds a vajra utpala.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
translated: It is the noble Tārā.

original: khro bo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: khro bo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The great wrathful one, etc.

original: drag po ni rdo rje 'jigs byed yin zhing de dag mtshungs pas na drag po'i 'od bzang ba'o //
analyzed: drag po ni rdo rje 'jigs byed yin zhing de dag mtshungs pas na drag po'i 'od bzang ba'o //
translated: Rudra is Vajrabhairava. Because they are similar, he has a good radiance like Rudra.

original: sems can thams cad 'jigs pa skyed par byed pas na 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed ces brjod do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jigs pa skyed par byed pas na 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed ces brjod do //
translated: Because he generates fear in all sentient beings, he is also called “fearful.”

original: gzhan gyi mi thub ces bya ba la sogs pa ni shes zad do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mi thub ces bya ba la sogs pa ni shes zad do //
translated: The unconquerable by others, etc. is well known.

original: khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni //
analyzed: khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni //
translated: The great wrathful one Hayagrīva,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar //
analyzed: bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar //
translated: Blazing like the fire of the eon.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: This is similar to the fire at the time of the destruction of the world.

original: gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan zhes bya ba ni phung po'i bdud kyi rang bzhin gyi tshangs pa mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan zhes bya ba ni phung po'i bdud kyi rang bzhin gyi tshangs pa mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The foot-crushing of the wicked means that he stands on Brahma, who is of the nature of the demon of the aggregates.

original: sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsam //
analyzed: sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsam //
translated: The practitioner should always contemplate.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor ram 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor ram 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: This means that one should perform the yoga of Great Vajradhara or the yoga of Amitabha,

original: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor thams cad pa las yang dag par phyung ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor thams cad pa las yang dag par phyung ste /
translated: and, as before, emerge from all the yogas,

original: des sems can gyi khams phung po'i bdud dang bral bar byas nas bkug ste rang gi lus la bcug la thams cad @235b gyur par byas nas bdag nyid 'phags pa rta mgrin du bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des sems can gyi khams phung po'i bdud dang bral bar byas nas bkug ste rang gi lus la bcug la thams cad @235b gyur par byas nas bdag nyid 'phags pa rta mgrin du bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and, having freed the realm of sentient beings from the demon of the aggregates, summon them and cause them to enter one's body, and, having transformed them all, one should imagine oneself as Noble Hayagriva.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The vajra of immortality, etc.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba ni zhe sdang ste de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba ni zhe sdang ste de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The blazing vajra is hatred, and he is like that.

original: ma bshad pa rnams kyi sku mdog la sogs pa ni takki ye shes la sgos pas bstan te /🔽takki 'dod par yang dag brjod //
analyzed: ma bshad pa rnams kyi sku mdog la sogs pa ni takki ye shes la sgos pas bstan te / takki 'dod par yang dag brjod //
translated: because it is said,🔽“Takki is said to be desire.”🔽The word Takki is to be taken as desire,

original: ces 'byung ba'i phyir takki zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dod pa la bya'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i phyir takki zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dod pa la bya'o //
translated: because it is said, “Takki is said to be desire.”

original: de nyid ye shes kyi khro bo'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir khro bo chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes kyi khro bo'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir khro bo chen po'o //
translated: He is a great wrathful one because he is the form of the wrathful one of gnosis.

original: zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed //
translated: The three faces terrify.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhal gsum gyis tha mal ba'i lus la sogs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhal gsum gyis tha mal ba'i lus la sogs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: The three faces that are the nature of Vajra Body and so forth terrify ordinary bodies and so forth.

original: spyod pa la brtson pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stobs po che'o //
analyzed: spyod pa la brtson pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stobs po che'o //
translated: He is a great power because he is supreme among all those who strive in conduct.

original: sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'o //
translated: He is the remover of the darkness of the three worlds because he destroys all the darkness of ignorance of all sentient beings.

original: gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
translated: He destroys all evildoers.

original: ces bya ba ni bdud bzhi dang bla ma la smod par byed pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bdud bzhi dang bla ma la smod par byed pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: The four demons are the four demons of the afflictions, the aggregates, the son of the gods, and death. And so on includes the slander of the guru and so on.

original: zhag gsum par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhag gsum par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The third day and so on have been explained.

original: rdo rje dbyig pa kha dog sngon po 'dzin par mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dbyig sngon can ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyig pa kha dog sngon po 'dzin par mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dbyig sngon can ni //
translated: Since he holds a blue vajra scepter, he is blue vajra.

original: khams gsum dag gi nang na gnas pa'i gdug pa rnams 'jigs par byed pas na khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum dag gi nang na gnas pa'i gdug pa rnams 'jigs par byed pas na khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: Since he terrifies the wicked who dwell in the three realms, he is terrifying the three realms.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba'i zhal gyi yan lag dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba'i zhal gyi yan lag dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung ba'o //
translated: Since he possesses the three faces that arise from body, speech, and mind, he is three faces, arisen from the three vajras.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing ma lus pa bsreg pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'od zer gyis 'bar ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'bar ba rnon po can no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing ma lus pa bsreg pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'od zer gyis 'bar ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'bar ba rnon po can no //
translated: Since he blazes with light rays that consume the fuel of the afflictions without remainder, he is blazing, sharp.

original: rdo rje ni sbyor ba'i mi phyed pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni sbyor ba'i mi phyed pa'i thabs te /
translated: The vajra is the method of indivisible union.🔽 🔽The three realms are the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de las g-yo ba med pas na rdo rje mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: de las g-yo ba med pas na rdo rje mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: Since he does not move from that, he is the vajra immovability.

original: thugs las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje las byung ba'o //
analyzed: thugs las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje las byung ba'o //
translated: Since he is born from the mind, he is the vajra born.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tha mi dad par lta ba'i sgo nas gcig tu mthong ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //🔽zhi ba zhes bya ba ni khro bo gzhan la ltos nas cung zad tsam nyid kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tha mi dad par lta ba'i sgo nas gcig tu mthong ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o // zhi ba zhes bya ba ni khro bo gzhan la ltos nas cung zad tsam nyid kyis yin gyi /
translated: Since he sees existence and nirvana as one by way of their non-difference, he is the immovable.🔽The one called peaceful is so only in relation to other wrathful ones, but not in every way,

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhi ba'i gzugs can ni ma yin ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhi ba'i gzugs can ni ma yin ste /
translated: because he has a peaceful form,

original: khro bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khro bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because he is wrathful himself.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //🔽gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig /
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to // gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig /
translated: The others have been explained.🔽The great uṣṇīṣa is the one syllable.

original: @236a * // ces bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um las byung ba'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'o //🔽'od zer dag ni kun nas 'phro //
analyzed: @236a * // ces bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um las byung ba'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'o // 'od zer dag ni kun nas 'phro //
translated: The one syllable is the syllable bhrūṃ, from which arises the great uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin.🔽He is completely radiant with light rays.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis kun du snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis kun du snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: He is completely radiant with light rays that spread out like the sun's rays.

original: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to ;🔽/ nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi /
analyzed: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to ; / nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi /
translated: The three faces and so forth have been explained.

original: ye shes mchog 'dzin par mdzad pas na gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes mchog 'dzin par mdzad pas na gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the supreme knowledge-holder of Sumbha, because he holds the supreme knowledge which has the characteristic of definitely destroying all afflictions.

original: de nyid ni drag po yin zhing de nyid ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni drag po yin zhing de nyid ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: He is Sumbha, and he is the ocean at the time of destruction.

original: 'di'i sku mdog la sogs pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo las bshad de 'on kyang skabs 'dir ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa yin zhing phyag g-yon pa lhag ma rnams kyis ni mi bskyod pa bzhin du mtshon cha nges par bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i sku mdog la sogs pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo las bshad de 'on kyang skabs 'dir ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa yin zhing phyag g-yon pa lhag ma rnams kyis ni mi bskyod pa bzhin du mtshon cha nges par bsnams pa'o //
translated: His color and so forth are explained in the protection cakra, but in this context he has the mudra of Vajra Humkara, and with the remaining left hands he definitely holds weapons like Akshobhya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir gzi brjid phung po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir gzi brjid phung po'o //
translated: He is Tejorasi, because he is the nature of the splendor of all Tathagatas.

original: 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i gtsug tor yod pas na gtsug tor rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i gtsug tor yod pas na gtsug tor rgyal ba'o //
translated: Since this has a crown protrusion that is not surpassed by any of the universal monarchs, it is the crown protrusion victor.

original: gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can //
analyzed: gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can //
translated: Those who have other mantra wheels

original: zhes bya bas ni 'di dag la brten nas 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad bzung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni 'di dag la brten nas 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad bzung ngo //
translated: are the eight universal monarchs based on these.

original: de rnams kyi sku mdog la sogs pa'i nges pa ni rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku mdog la sogs pa'i nges pa ni rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las shes par bya'o //
translated: The certainty of their body colors and so forth should be understood from the Vajra Essence Ornament.

original: zhal dang phyag gi nges pa yang de nyid las bshad de /
analyzed: zhal dang phyag gi nges pa yang de nyid las bshad de /
translated: The certainty of faces and hands is also explained in that very text.

original: rang gi phyag mtshan ni rtsa ba'i phyag la lhag ma la ni de las bshad pa'i phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi phyag mtshan ni rtsa ba'i phyag la lhag ma la ni de las bshad pa'i phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: Their own hand implements are in the principal hands, and the remaining hand implements are the hand implements explained in that text.

original: dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams ni //
translated: These are the enjoyments of the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa'i sku mnga' ba bdag nyid srung bar nus pa rnams so sor rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa'i sku mnga' ba bdag nyid srung bar nus pa rnams so sor rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the yogis and yoginis should meditate on the forms of the deities, distinguished by color, faces, hands, weapons, and so on, and capable of protecting themselves.

original: lha rnams re re'i ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med cing tshad med par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: lha rnams re re'i ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med cing tshad med par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The samadhis of each of the deities are explained as being immeasurable and limitless.

original: de ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes she na /
translated: How is that known?

original: de'i phyir re re yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽nam mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags //
analyzed: de'i phyir re re yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / nam mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags //
translated: Therefore, it is said, each of them... and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni gal te nam mkha' la yul nges pa yod na de'i tshe khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sprul pa rnams kyis de yang kun du bkang nas sprul pa ches lhag par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i @236b don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gal te nam mkha' la yul nges pa yod na de'i tshe khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sprul pa rnams kyis de yang kun du bkang nas sprul pa ches lhag par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i @236b don to //
translated: Extremely exalted in the sky means that if there is a definite place in the sky, then even that would be filled by the emanations of the wrathful samadhis, and there would be even more emanations. This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur par byas nas bshad ma thag pa'i lha thams cad bsgom par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur par byas nas bshad ma thag pa'i lha thams cad bsgom par bya ba yin pas /
translated: Having transformed into Great Vajradhara, one should cultivate all the deities just explained.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the root text says, “in the realm of space,” and so forth.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i btsun mo'i nam mkha'i dbyings su 'od gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o ;
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i btsun mo'i nam mkha'i dbyings su 'od gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o ;
translated: In the realm of space of the previously explained queen, the mandala of clear light is Vairochana’s.

original: / sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: / sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: Buddha is Vajradhara.

original: de'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs so //
analyzed: de'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs so //
translated: His form is buddha form.

original: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam //
translated: Vairochana is imagined.

original: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du bstan te /
translated: This is taught by the root text.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshul bzhin du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la rang gi rig ma'i padma la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba la dzin dzika ces bya ba 'dis rnam
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshul bzhin du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la rang gi rig ma'i padma la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba la dzin dzika ces bya ba 'dis rnam
translated: Endowed with the yoga of Great Vajradhara in accordance with the method of the means of achievement, immediately after the meditative stabilization of the initial union, one should imagine a moon in the lotus of one’s knowledge consort, upon which is the syllable jinajik.

original: par snang mdzad bskyed nas rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la phyung ste /
analyzed: par snang mdzad bskyed nas rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la phyung ste /
translated: Having generated Vairocana, one should bless with the three vajras, and then emit.

original: de 'gro ba'i don byed du bcug la de bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: de 'gro ba'i don byed du bcug la de bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
translated: Having caused him to work for the welfare of living beings, one should summon him and cause him to enter one's body.

original: thams cad gyur par bya bas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad gyur par bya bas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
translated: Having caused everything to transform, one should imagine oneself as Vairocana.

original: de bzhin du lha thams cad bskyed pa'i bsgom pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha thams cad bskyed pa'i bsgom pa shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand the meditation on the generation of all deities.

original: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zla ba gsal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zla ba gsal ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like a clear moon, because of being pure by nature.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir me long lta bur yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir me long lta bur yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
translated: It arises like a mirror, because of being the nature of mirror-like pristine awareness, which is the natural outflow of emptiness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i rnam pa can gyi khams gsum pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i rnam pa can gyi khams gsum pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: For that very reason, it is the mandala of the three realms, because it is the cause for the arising of the reflection of the three realms in the form of a vajra.

original: gzhan ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni go sla'o //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: bsam gtan rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon gsungs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon gsungs te /
translated: The vajra of meditative stabilization, etc.

original: gzhan la yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzhan la yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: states the benefits, and the same applies to the others.

original: gang la rnam par snang mdzad 'byung zhing skye ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la rnam par snang mdzad 'byung zhing skye ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has the arising, the birth of Vairochana is so called.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra mandala is Akshobhya.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Since it is the pure knowledge of the beginningless and endless reality realm, it is like a clear body.

original: gzhan ni shes par zad do //
analyzed: gzhan ni shes par zad do //
translated: The rest is easily understood.

original: 'di la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi thugs kyi rnam pa mnga' bas na ye shes gnas so //
analyzed: 'di la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi thugs kyi rnam pa mnga' bas na ye shes gnas so //
translated: Here, he is the abode of knowledge, since he has the form of the mind which is the nature of the knowledge of the reality realm.

original: dam tshig thams cad ni mi bskyod pa ste /🔽de 'byung ba ni skye ba yin zhing gang la de nyid mdzes pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad ni mi bskyod pa ste / de 'byung ba ni skye ba yin zhing gang la de nyid mdzes pa ste /
translated: All commitments are Akshobhya.

original: bzang po'i rdo rje yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bzang po'i rdo rje yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: His arising is birth, and he who has that beauty, that good vajra, is so called.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil @237a * //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil @237a * //
translated: The dharma mandala is the mandala of Amitabha.

original: 'khor ro // chos kyi sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ro // chos kyi sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: The Dharma-hero is Amitābha,

original: chos thams cad la so sor rtog pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la so sor rtog pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the purity of his discernment of all dharmas.

original: gsal ba ni padma r'a ga'i mdog can no //
analyzed: gsal ba ni padma r'a ga'i mdog can no //
translated: The clear one is Padmanarteśvara,

original: mchog tu dga' ba dang sgeg pa'i ro'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir zhi ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba dang sgeg pa'i ro'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir zhi ba'o //
translated: because of his nature of the rapture and sport of supreme joy.

original: 'od zer sprin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang gi ba spu las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi 'khor los nam mkha' kun du gang bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer sprin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang gi ba spu las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi 'khor los nam mkha' kun du gang bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: By the cloud of light rays, etc., one should imagine the sky filled with the circle of clouds of various light rays issuing from one’s pores.

original: chos kyi sku nyid yin pa'i phyir sku gsum mi phyed pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku nyid yin pa'i phyir sku gsum mi phyed pa las byung ba'o //
translated: Because of the Dharma Body, he is born from the indivisible three bodies.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi ye shes nyid chu'i khams bzhin du thams cad du 'gro ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes rgya mtsho yin zhing /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi ye shes nyid chu'i khams bzhin du thams cad du 'gro ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes rgya mtsho yin zhing /
translated: The ocean of intuition is the intuition of the discerning insight, because it is like the water element, going everywhere.

original: de rig ma'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa dang sbyor bas brgyan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: de rig ma'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa dang sbyor bas brgyan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par brgyan pa ste /
translated: It is adorned because it is adorned with the union with the transformed form of the knowledge woman.

original: de tshe 'di nyid la thogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de tshe 'di nyid la thogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that at that time, it is obstructed.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin no//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin no//
translated: The samadhi is like the one just past.

original: zla bas mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zla bas mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The mandala marked with a moon is the mandala of the moon.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
translated: It is the mandala of the body.

original: spyan gyi mchog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
analyzed: spyan gyi mchog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
translated: The supreme eye is the Buddha eye.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: The rest is similar to what was explained.

original: spyan gyi dam tshig ni 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan gyi gzugs kyi rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: spyan gyi dam tshig ni 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan gyi gzugs kyi rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The commitment of the eye is Vairochana in the form of the wheel emblem.

original: sems rtse gcig pa gang la phyag gi mchog tu rnam par bsgoms pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa gang la phyag gi mchog tu rnam par bsgoms pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is the one-pointed mind that is contemplated as the supreme gesture.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra mandala is the mandala of the mind.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni rigs gnyis kyi rang bzhin can m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni rigs gnyis kyi rang bzhin can m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The one called Vajra of Space is Mamaki, who has the nature of the two families.

original: nam mkha'i yum zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi yum ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yum zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi yum ste /
translated: The mother of space is the mother of the jewel family, who is similar to space.

original: gang la de nyid kyi padma las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin rnams kyis rdo rje'i rigs tshim par byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la de nyid kyi padma las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin rnams kyis rdo rje'i rigs tshim par byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who has the clouds of light rays that arise from her own lotus, which satisfy the vajra family, is called that.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bshad zin to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bshad zin to //
translated: The explanation of the wheel of Dharma is finished.

original: rdo rje chos ma zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The one called Vajra Dharma is Pandaravasini.

original: padma r'a ga zla 'od 'dra ba ni dmar po cung zad skya ba ste /
analyzed: padma r'a ga zla 'od 'dra ba ni dmar po cung zad skya ba ste /
translated: The one who is like the light of a ruby is red with a little white,

original: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang thod le kor bsres pa des bris pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang thod le kor bsres pa des bris pa lta bu'o //
translated: like a drawing with a mixture of lac and mica.

original: thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i thugs 'dzin pas na 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin pa ste 'od dpag tu med pa yin zhing /
analyzed: thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i thugs 'dzin pas na 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin pa ste 'od dpag tu med pa yin zhing /
translated: The one who holds the mind of great compassion's passion is the holder of passion's passion, who is Amitabha.

original: de'i sdug pa ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sdug pa ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: His beloved is his desire.

original: chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni 'od @237b dpag tu med pa'i byung ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni 'od @237b dpag tu med pa'i byung ba'i gnas so //
translated: The abode of the pristine awareness of the Dharma is the source of Amitābha.

original: de'i phyir sgrub pa po rnams kyis gsang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub pa po rnams kyis gsang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is to be kept secret by the adepts.

original: autpala dmar po phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: autpala dmar po phyag na bsnams //
translated: He holds a red lotus in his hand.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis thugs kar kha phye ba de'i rtsa ba g-yon pa dril bu dang bcas pas gzung ba'i thabs mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis thugs kar kha phye ba de'i rtsa ba g-yon pa dril bu dang bcas pas gzung ba'i thabs mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: This shows the method of holding the red lotus with the left hand at the heart, its stem held by the left hand with a bell.

original: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is Amitābha.

original: dam tshig ni gos dkar mo ste de dang yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom pa'i sgo nas de kho nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa ni bde ba chen po mngon par byang chub pa mngon du byed pa yin zhing gang la de nyid mi
analyzed: dam tshig ni gos dkar mo ste de dang yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom pa'i sgo nas de kho nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa ni bde ba chen po mngon par byang chub pa mngon du byed pa yin zhing gang la de nyid mi
translated: The pledge is Pāṇḍaravāsinī. The display of the manifest enlightenment of reality through the cultivation of union with her is the actualization of the manifest enlightenment of great bliss.

original: phyed pa yin pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyed pa yin pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has that reality, that non-differentiation, is so called.

original: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The “maṇḍala of powers” is the maṇḍala of Amoghasiddhi.

original: sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
translated: “The supreme Tārā” is the noble Tārā.

original: gang la kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba ste ba bla'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: gang la kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba ste ba bla'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: One who has the color of a beryl, that is, the color of an emerald, is so-called.

original: bee d'urya'i ljang ser gyi mdog can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bee d'urya'i ljang ser gyi mdog can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that she has the color of a yellow-green beryl.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'o //
translated: She is born from the vajra samādhi, because she is born from the moon of the thought of enlightenment.

original: autpala ser po'i mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: autpala ser po'i mdog 'dra ba //
translated: She is the color of a yellow lotus.

original: zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is that she is similar to that.

original: dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa ste /
translated: The pledge is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de'i rig ma ni dam tshig sgrol ma yin zhing de nyid mchog ste sems rtse gcig pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i rig ma ni dam tshig sgrol ma yin zhing de nyid mchog ste sems rtse gcig pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o ;
translated: His knowledge woman is the pledge Tārā, and she is the supreme, the one-pointed thought. One who has that is so-called.

original: / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan no //
analyzed: / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan no //
translated: The “sun disk” is the sun seat on the lotus in the center of the body mandala.

original: gshin rje'i rnam pas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms par byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gshin rje'i rnam pas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms par byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do //
translated: “Slayer of Yama” is so called because it slays the demon of death by the aspect of Yama.

original: de nyid ni mchog ste de'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mchog ste de'o //
translated: That itself is supreme, that is, the best.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //🔽de ltar dkyil 'khor de dang de la gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rig ma'i padma na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bdag nyid rang gi snying po rnams
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to // de ltar dkyil 'khor de dang de la gnas pa'i padma'i steng gi nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rig ma'i padma na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bdag nyid rang gi snying po rnams
translated: The others have already been explained.🔽Thus, on the sun seat on the lotus in each of those mandalas, the yogin endowed with the great vajra yoga should generate himself in the form of all the wrathful ones on the sun mandala of bodhicitta located in the lotus of the knowledge woman.

original: kyis de kho na bzhin du khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs su bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no ;
analyzed: kyis de kho na bzhin du khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs su bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no ;
translated: This is the difference.

original: / gang la 'phags pa gshin rje gshed spro ba'i bkod pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'chi bdag gi bdud rnam par gzhom par bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: / gang la 'phags pa gshin rje gshed spro ba'i bkod pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'chi bdag gi bdud rnam par gzhom par bya ba yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
