analyzed: gal te de lta yang klu gdug pa rnams char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs na /
translated: If, even though it is like that, the wicked nāgas do not cause a rain shower,

original: de'i tshe me thab gru gsum byas la /
analyzed: de'i tshe me thab gru gsum byas la /
translated: then at that time one should make a triangular hearth,

original: de'i dbus su 'phags pa stobs po che bsams nas gdol pa'i me blangs la yi ge phu: rnams kyis sbar te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su 'phags pa stobs po che bsams nas gdol pa'i me blangs la yi ge phu: rnams kyis sbar te /
translated: and having visualized Noble Mahābala in the middle of it, one should take out a caṇḍāla fire, and ignite it with the syllables phaṭ.

original: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva dang myos byed rnams kyis klu'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva dang myos byed rnams kyis klu'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: One should make an effigy of the nāgas with poison, black mustard seed, salt, and alcohol,

original: mtshon rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams te /
analyzed: mtshon rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams te /
translated: and with a sharp weapon, beginning from the head,

original: gtubs nas kha lho ru ba ltas pas 'phags pa stobs po che'i sngags so so'am ma lus par brjod la /
analyzed: gtubs nas kha lho ru ba ltas pas 'phags pa stobs po che'i sngags so so'am ma lus par brjod la /
translated: one should cut it up, and facing south, one should recite the mantra of Noble Mahābala, either individually or in its entirety,

original: lag pa g-yon pas de sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas de sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: and with one's left hand one should offer it into the fire.

original: lus bshang gcis byugs pas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gdon mi za bar chad kyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do //
analyzed: lus bshang gcis byugs pas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gdon mi za bar chad kyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do //
translated: If one offers it one hundred and eight times, smeared with excrement and urine, one will certainly cause a rain shower.

original: gal te de ltar yang char mi 'bab pa na 'phags pa stobs po che nyid kyi nyes pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yang char mi 'bab pa na 'phags pa stobs po che nyid kyi nyes pa yin te /
translated: If it still does not rain, then it is the fault of the noble Mahābala himself.

original: de'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis 'phags pa stobs po che'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis 'phags pa stobs po che'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: Therefore, one should make an effigy of the noble Mahābala with the substances explained previously.

original: khro bo dpa' gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
analyzed: khro bo dpa' gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the yoga of the wrathful heroic Ucchuṣma,

original: spyan drangs ba'i sngon du 'gro bas de kho na bzhin du rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
analyzed: spyan drangs ba'i sngon du 'gro bas de kho na bzhin du rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
translated: one should summon him with the preliminary practices, just as before, stepping on his head with one’s left foot.

original: myur du char phob cig ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i yi ge h'um gi sngags khri bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: myur du char phob cig ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i yi ge h'um gi sngags khri bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra of the syllable hūṃ ten thousand times, with the urging words, “Quickly bring rain!”

original: de nas mngon spyod kyi thab khung na gnas pa'i khro bo dpal gnod mdzes rgyal po yi ge h'um las byung ba'i ljags mnga' zhing zhal gdangs pa de'i zhal du gzugs brnyan bcug ste sbyin sreg khri bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mngon spyod kyi thab khung na gnas pa'i khro bo dpal gnod mdzes rgyal po yi ge h'um las byung ba'i ljags mnga' zhing zhal gdangs pa de'i zhal du gzugs brnyan bcug ste sbyin sreg khri bya'o //
translated: Then, in the hearth of fierce action, the wrathful glorious Ucchuṣma, the king arisen from the syllable hūṃ, with a tongue and an open mouth, one should place the effigy in his mouth and perform a homa of ten thousand oblations.

original: 'dis ni nges par 'phags pa stobs po ches char 'bebs su 'jug go zhes bya ba'i mthu ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad la rab tu grub po //
analyzed: 'dis ni nges par 'phags pa stobs po ches char 'bebs su 'jug go zhes bya ba'i mthu ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad la rab tu grub po //
translated: This shows that the power of the mantra of the noble Mahābala is well established for all yogins.

original: yang na klu thams cad dang 'phags pa stobs po che la dmigs te /
analyzed: yang na klu thams cad dang 'phags pa stobs po che la dmigs te /
translated: Or else, visualizing all the nāgas and the noble Mahābala,

original: me thab zlum po la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan sku mdog dkar po zhi ba'i yi ge aom las byung ba'i ljags dang ldan pa'i zhal du de'i sngags kyis zhi ba'i cho ga bzhin du mar dang 'o ma la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg khri byas nas gdon mi🔽za bar bcom ldan 'das ma de sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me thab zlum po la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan sku mdog dkar po zhi ba'i yi ge aom las byung ba'i ljags dang ldan pa'i zhal du de'i sngags kyis zhi ba'i cho ga bzhin du mar dang 'o ma la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg khri byas nas gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das ma de sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: on a round hearth, the Buddha eye, white in color and peaceful, with a tongue arisen from the syllable oṃ, in the mouth, with its mantra, one should perform a fire sacrifice of ten thousand oblations of ghee, milk, and so on, according to the rite for pacifying.🔽Then, without a doubt, that Blessed Lady will generate peace for the buddhas.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs @245b pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs @245b pa la /
translated: Then, the Blessed Lady, having generated peace for the buddhas,

original: snga ma bzhin du kun du mi bskyod pa yin zhing /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du kun du mi bskyod pa yin zhing /
translated: as before, is Akṣobhya.

original: de las byung ba'i 'joms pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'joms pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conqueror of that is the king of desire, because he conquers the afflictions such as desire.

original: de la dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi that has that as its object is so called because it is indivisible.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the yoga of Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: one should make an effigy of the victim, and with the yoga of the noble king of desire, as it is,

original: spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro bas g-yon brkyang zhing rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar bas mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas mnan te /
analyzed: spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro bas g-yon brkyang zhing rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar bas mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas mnan te /
translated: one should summon him, and with one's left leg extended and one's right foot on the head of the effigy marked with a blazing vajra hook,

original: de'i sngags brjod cing snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya ba'o //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i sngags brjod cing snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya ba'o //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: one should recite the mantra and summon with the vajra hook as before.🔽Then, having summoned him, one should bind him with the noose and fetter, and having struck him with the vajra, one should threaten him with the threatening mudra.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams kyi yan lag thams cad brgyus pa'i phyir ye shes kyi phreng ba ste /
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams kyi yan lag thams cad brgyus pa'i phyir ye shes kyi phreng ba ste /
translated: It is a garland of pristine consciousnesses because it is the stringing of all the branches of the pristine consciousnesses of the mirror-like pristine consciousness, and so on.🔽

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The garland of intuition is the great Vajradhara, because he is the garland of all the branches of the intuitions such as the mirrorintuition.

original: de las byung ba'i tshul ni byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rang bzhin can gyi 'phags pa mi g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i tshul ni byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rang bzhin can gyi 'phags pa mi g-yo ba ste /
translated: The method of arising from that is the noble Acalli, who is of the nature of the water of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi focused on that is called the unbreakable, because it is unbreakable.

original: skrag par gyur nas /
analyzed: skrag par gyur nas /
translated: Having become frightened,

original: kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur //
translated: the mouth is drawn into the body.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas skyes bu'i thod pa ma gas shing mtshan dang ldan pa blangs la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas skyes bu'i thod pa ma gas shing mtshan dang ldan pa blangs la /
translated: This means that one who is endowed with the yoga of the noble Acalli, as it is, takes up a skull of a man who has not been cremated and who has all the characteristics.

original: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i khrag dang lan tshva dang nyungs mar tsha ba dang ske tshe la sogs pa rnams kyis lha chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan rang gi lha mo dang ldan pa bris te /
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i khrag dang lan tshva dang nyungs mar tsha ba dang ske tshe la sogs pa rnams kyis lha chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan rang gi lha mo dang ldan pa bris te /
translated: With the blood of the right toe, salt, mustard seed oil, and black mustard seed, and so on, draw the image of Maheśvara and so on, together with one's deity,

original: spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyus mchan pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas mnan la /
analyzed: spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyus mchan pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas mnan la /
translated: and having invited them, as before, with the vajra hook, trample on the right foot of the one to be summoned.

original: lcags kyu des dgug par lta zhing bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod na /
analyzed: lcags kyu des dgug par lta zhing bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod na /
translated: Looking at him with that hook, and reciting the mantra with urging,

original: chung ma dang bcas pa rnams gdon mi za bar 'gugs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chung ma dang bcas pa rnams gdon mi za bar 'gugs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: without doubt, he and his wife will be summoned.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, Vajrapāṇi, etc.

original: dam tshig ni khro bo thams cad kyi rgyu mi bskyod pa ste /🔽khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes //
analyzed: dam tshig ni khro bo thams cad kyi rgyu mi bskyod pa ste / khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes //
translated: Commitment is Akṣobhya, the cause of all wrathful ones,

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said, “Wrath arises from the abode of hatred.”

original: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni dpal gnod mdzes zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni dpal gnod mdzes zhes bya ba ste /
translated: His emanation is called Śrī-Uṣṇīṣa-Cakravarman.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //🔽bu mo thu chen thams cad ces bya ba ni spyan la sogs @246a * //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o // bu mo thu chen thams cad ces bya ba ni spyan la sogs @246a * //
translated: The samadhi focused on that is so-called because it is indivisible.

original: pa rnams so //
analyzed: pa rnams so //
translated: The great daughters are Locana and so on.

original: 'dod chags kyi bde ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir sku bshig cing gos dang bral bar gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi bde ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir sku bshig cing gos dang bral bar gyur ba'o //
translated: Because they are under the control of the bliss of passion, they are broken and naked.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dpal gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dpal gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is glorious Sumbharaja.

original: de nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag po ste /
analyzed: de nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag po ste /
translated: He is the lord of all tathagatas because he is the lord of his own mandala.

original: de'i zhabs ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs te des so //
analyzed: de'i zhabs ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs te des so //
translated: His feet are the feet of Vajrasattva, the lord of all tathagatas. By that means by those feet.

original: des ni 'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bud med kyi thod pa mtshan dang ldan pa la spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba'am lha la sogs pa'i bu mo rkang pa
analyzed: des ni 'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bud med kyi thod pa mtshan dang ldan pa la spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba'am lha la sogs pa'i bu mo rkang pa
translated: This teaches that one who is endowed with the yoga of the noble Akashagarbha, having written the name of a woman who has the signs of a suitable skull-cup, or a girl of the god class, etc.,

original: g-yon pa'i aa na mi ka'i khrag gis bris te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i aa na mi ka'i khrag gis bris te /
translated: with the blood of a woman in her left foot,

original: de'i bha ga la rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas lag pa g-yas pa la thogs pa'i lcags kyus snying gnas btab ste /
analyzed: de'i bha ga la rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas lag pa g-yas pa la thogs pa'i lcags kyus snying gnas btab ste /
translated: and having pressed her down with his left foot marked with a vajra hook in her bhaga, and having struck her heart with a hook held in his right hand,

original: zhags pas rke nas bcings la ;
analyzed: zhags pas rke nas bcings la ;
translated: and having bound her neck with a noose,

original: bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags brjod cing dgug par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags brjod cing dgug par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: one should summon her with the mantra endowed with the words of urging.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: dam tshig chen po ni de bzhin du thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni de bzhin du thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: The great commitment is the mind vajra, as before.

original: gang la de 'byung ba mi phyed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la de 'byung ba mi phyed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has that, which is indivisible, is so called.

original: dam tshig chen po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o ;
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o ;
translated: The great commitment is glorious Vajrasattva.

original: / de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni gsum gyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: / de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni gsum gyi gsang ba'o //
translated: His body, speech, and mind secrets are the secrets of the three.

original: tshig tu brjod pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyis gnas so //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyis gnas so //
translated: The collection of sounds that reveal the unerring meaning that is not to be transgressed by verbal expression abides as the reality of the commitment of speech.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o ;
translated: The vajra buddha is glorious Vajrasattva.

original: / de'i chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul ba'i bdag nyid kyi sku bsgom pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul ba'i bdag nyid kyi sku bsgom pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation on his Dharma, Enjoyment, and Emanation Bodies is the meditation on Vajrasattva.

original: zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The vajra hook is the vajra hook-holder,

original: rdo rje rigs kyi lha rnams kyi gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi lha rnams kyi gzugs kyis so //
translated: in the form of the deities of the Vajra Family.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad yin zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad yin zhing /
translated: The buddha is Vairocana.

original: de dgug pa ni sangs rgyas dgug pa ste bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dgug pa ni sangs rgyas dgug pa ste bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The summoning of him is the summoning of the buddha.

original: sangs rgyas gsung ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gsung ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The buddha speech is Amitābha.

original: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The body is Vairochana.

original: de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: By the application of any of them.

original: 'khor lo chen po ni gsung rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po ni gsung rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The great wheel is the mandala of the vajra of speech, etc.

original: de la gnas pa'i sgom pa @246b pos sam padma'i lcags kyus dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i sgom pa @246b pos sam padma'i lcags kyus dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the meditation of the one who abides in that, or by the lotus hook, one summons glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: This is an illustration,

original: rin po che la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i lcags kyu dang zhags pa rnams kyis lha thams cad phan tshun dgug par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: rin po che la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i lcags kyu dang zhags pa rnams kyis lha thams cad phan tshun dgug par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir /
translated: because all the deities are to be summoned by the hooks and nooses marked with their own insignia, such as the jewel, etc.🔽Therefore,

original: rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis //
translated: by the special vajra hook,

original: sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
translated: all mantras are the best to summon.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab las grub pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad rdo rje'i dngos so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab las grub pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad rdo rje'i dngos so //
translated: Since they are all composed of the atoms of all the Ones-Gone-Thus, they are all vajra entities.

original: sgrub pa po rnams kyi dge legs thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhi ba'o /
analyzed: sgrub pa po rnams kyi dge legs thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhi ba'o /
translated: It is peace because it causes the attainment of virtue and goodness for all adepts.

original: rang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The being of one's mantra is

original: rang gi snying ga nas bskyed pa'i rang gi lha'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga nas bskyed pa'i rang gi lha'o //
translated: one's deity generated from one's heart.🔽The best of human girls is

original: mi'i bu mo mchog ces bya ba ni rgyal po'i bu mo'o //
analyzed: mi'i bu mo mchog ces bya ba ni rgyal po'i bu mo'o //
translated: the daughter of a king.

original: snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyar //
analyzed: snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyar //
translated: The vajra hook at the heart

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar khro bo 'phags pa gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pas bu mo dgug pa bstan pa de bzhin du lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi lcags kyus snying ga nas
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar khro bo 'phags pa gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pas bu mo dgug pa bstan pa de bzhin du lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi lcags kyus snying ga nas
translated: means that just as the yoga of wrathful Noble Akashagarbha teaches the summoning of a girl with a vajra hook and a noose, so too, with the yoga of any deity, one should summon her with the hook of one's own implement, piercing her heart with it.

original: phug ste / de dang des mtshan pa'i zhags pas kyang ske nas bcings la /
analyzed: phug ste / de dang des mtshan pa'i zhags pas kyang ske nas bcings la /
translated: Then, with the noose marked with that, one should bind her neck.

original: yi ge yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i bu mo yi ge dza'i mtha' can gyi rang gi sngags zlos shing dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i bu mo yi ge dza'i mtha' can gyi rang gi sngags zlos shing dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should summon the girl who is seated on a wind mandala arisen from the syllable yaṃ, reciting one's own mantra ending with the syllable jaḥ.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsams la /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsams la /
translated: By moon mandala and so on, it is taught as follows: Endowed with the yoga of noble Amṛtakuṇḍali just as before, one should imagine Mahāvairocana himself becoming a moon mandala.

original: brgya byin gyi chung ma sha tsi de ru bzhag ste /
analyzed: brgya byin gyi chung ma sha tsi de ru bzhag ste /
translated: Placing Śacī, Indra's wife, there,

original: 'das ma thag pa bzhin du sngags lan lnga bcu brjod cing zhags pa dang lcags kyus dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'das ma thag pa bzhin du sngags lan lnga bcu brjod cing zhags pa dang lcags kyus dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: one should summon her with the noose and hook, reciting the mantra fifty times as if it were just past.

original: rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po //
translated: The great form of the vajra hook,

original: 'bar ba rno ba 'dra ba'i 'od //
analyzed: 'bar ba rno ba 'dra ba'i 'od //
translated: blazing, sharp, with the light of a flame.

original: 'od ces bya ba ni lha'i gzugs phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams shing nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'od ces bya ba ni lha'i gzugs phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams shing nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Light means the form of the deity, Vajrapāṇi holding a hook, endowed with the light of a billion suns.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Vajra maṇḍala means the sun maṇḍala.

original: nam mkha'i bu mo zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rdo rje spyan no //🔽'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha gang yang rung @247a * //
analyzed: nam mkha'i bu mo zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rdo rje spyan no // 'di skad du ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha gang yang rung @247a * //
translated: Daughter of space means the eye of the vajra of space.

original: ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying ga nas grub pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu zhal gsum phyag drug pa snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying ga nas grub pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu zhal gsum phyag drug pa snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: This is saying that one who is endowed with the yoga of any of the deities of the vajra family, such as Akṣobhya and so on, should, as before, emanate from one's heart a three-faced, six-armed Vajra hook, abiding in union, holding a vajra hook and a noose with the two principal hands,

original: phyag lhag ma mi bskyod pa dang mthun pa phyung ste /
analyzed: phyag lhag ma mi bskyod pa dang mthun pa phyung ste /
translated: and the remaining hands similar to Akṣobhya.

original: de la bka' bsgo bar bya zhing h'um dza: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la bka' bsgo bar bya zhing h'um dza: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
translated: One should give him an order and also recite the mantra hum jraḥ.

original: de nas de song ste nam mkha' na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje spyan de kho na bzhin du bkug nas 'ongs te gtad par bsams na gdon mi za bar 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas de song ste nam mkha' na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje spyan de kho na bzhin du bkug nas 'ongs te gtad par bsams na gdon mi za bar 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having gone there, having summoned that space-vajra eye just as before, abiding in the orb of the sun in the sky, and having come, it is imagined that it is placed in one's own eyes.

original: nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dgug pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dgug pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is taught that one should summon the celestial maidens who move in the sky in the same way.

original: khro bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: khro bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to angry, etc.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs bzang po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs bzang po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the nature of the excellent body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje 'og gnas pa ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'og gnas pa ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug pa'o //
translated: The vajra below means abiding in the abode of the demigods.

original: lha min ni lha ma yin te /
analyzed: lha min ni lha ma yin te /
translated: The demigod is the demigod;

original: de rnams kyi bu mo ni lha min bu mo'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bu mo ni lha min bu mo'o //
translated: the daughter of those is the demigod daughter.

original: 'di skad du snga ma bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'phags pa rdo rjes 'og mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di skad du snga ma bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'phags pa rdo rjes 'og mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: This is the same as before: the transformation of Great Vajradhara precedes the noble Vajrapāṇi, who is similar to Akṣobhya.

original: 'on kyang g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
translated: However, one should visualize oneself standing with the left leg straight, holding a vajra hook and a noose with the right and left primary hands,

original: g-yon pa'i gsum pas rtse gsum bsnams par bdag nyid dmigs la /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i gsum pas rtse gsum bsnams par bdag nyid dmigs la /
translated: and holding a trident with the left third hand.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo de kho na bzhin du dgug par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo de kho na bzhin du dgug par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: One should summon the celestial maiden of the demigods sitting on the wind mandala, just as she is.

original: btsag gam zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: btsag gam zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: The passage beginning with “vermillion” teaches the following.

original: rdo rje 'gog pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas mtshan ma thob pa rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i phyi rol gyi rig ma dang yang dag par ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la rig
analyzed: rdo rje 'gog pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas mtshan ma thob pa rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i phyi rol gyi rig ma dang yang dag par ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la rig
translated: One who has obtained the signs by means of the meditation on the vajra block, endowed with the yoga of any deity such as Vajra, and so on, and endowed with an external knowledge consort, immediately after the meditative concentration of the first union,

original: ma'i padma na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba'i gdan la btsag gam rdo rgyus bzhag ste /
analyzed: ma'i padma na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba'i gdan la btsag gam rdo rgyus bzhag ste /
translated: places vermillion or red chalk on the moon seat of bodhicitta located in the lotus of the knowledge consort.

original: de yang yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sa bon gang yang rung bas rdo rje lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa'i lha'i gzugs su bskyed la /
analyzed: de yang yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sa bon gang yang rung bas rdo rje lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa'i lha'i gzugs su bskyed la /
translated: Moreover, one should generate the form of the deity holding an iron hook in his hand, with any seed syllable such as HŪṀ.

original: sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: One should consecrate it with the three seed syllables.

original: de las byung ba'i lha rdo rje lcags kyu spros pa rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la bsdu ba dang bstim pa dang brtan par @247b bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing zla ba btang gi bar du yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i lha rdo rje lcags kyu spros pa rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la bsdu ba dang bstim pa dang brtan par @247b bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing zla ba btang gi bar du yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The deities who arise from that, iron hooks, should be emanated and fill the whole sky. One should meditate again and again on the gathering, the dissolving, the stabilizing, and the worship, until the moon is released.

original: de nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one will succeed.

original: des tshangs pa la sogs pa'i ming bris pa tsam gyis gdon mi za bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des tshangs pa la sogs pa'i ming bris pa tsam gyis gdon mi za bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely writing the names of Brahmā and so forth, they will certainly come.

original: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with all the supreme aspects

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can du bsams nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can du bsams nas so //
translated: means that, having contemplated oneself as glorious Mañjuvajra, with the characteristics explained above,

original: bskal pa'i sreg pa 'khor lo che //
analyzed: bskal pa'i sreg pa 'khor lo che //
translated: the fire of the aeon, the great wheel,

original: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba dang mtshungs pa bsams la /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba dang mtshungs pa bsams la /
translated: This is saying that, in accordance with the previously explained process, one should imagine the maṇḍala of speech blazing like the fire at the end of the eon.

original: de'i dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag tu rang gi sngags las byung ba'i 'phags pa gshin rje gshed yongs su gyur par byas nas rdo rje lcags kyu bsams te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag tu rang gi sngags las byung ba'i 'phags pa gshin rje gshed yongs su gyur par byas nas rdo rje lcags kyu bsams te /
translated: In its center, one should be endowed with the yoga of noble Mañjuśrī just as it is, and in the right primary hand, one should imagine a vajra hook arisen from one’s mantra and transformed into noble Yamāntaka.

original: de nas mngon par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin mo lcags kyu des snying ga nas pug la /
analyzed: de nas mngon par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin mo lcags kyu des snying ga nas pug la /
translated: Then, with that hook, one should pull out the yakṣiṇī one desires from her heart,

original: zhags pas kyang ske dang lag pa nas bcings te /
analyzed: zhags pas kyang ske dang lag pa nas bcings te /
translated: and with a noose, one should bind her by the neck and arms.

original: de nyid sngags brjod cing bkug la nye bar longs spyad par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid sngags brjod cing bkug la nye bar longs spyad par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Reciting that very mantra, one should summon her and enjoy her.

original: bshad zin pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify the meaning that has been explained,

original: kun gyi phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kun gyi phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “the mudrā of all,” and so on.

original: phyag rgya'i khyad par ni lha de dang de rnams kyi rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i khyad par rang gi phyag mtshan gyi lcags kyu'i khyad par te /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i khyad par ni lha de dang de rnams kyi rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i khyad par rang gi phyag mtshan gyi lcags kyu'i khyad par te /
translated: The special seal is the special great seal of non-duality with the knowledge consort of that and that deity, the special iron hook of one's own hand implement.

original: de dang rang gi bzlas pa'i sngags kyi khyad par gyis thams cad du zhes bya ba sbyor ba rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par sgrub pa pos ni ji skad bshad pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang rang gi bzlas pa'i sngags kyi khyad par gyis thams cad du zhes bya ba sbyor ba rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par sgrub pa pos ni ji skad bshad pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the special mantra recitation of that, everywhere means that the adept will accomplish all that has been explained, by perfecting all the aspects of the practice.

original: gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: If done otherwise, it will be destroyed.

original: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba ma tshang bas dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba ma tshang bas dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that if the practice is incomplete, the spiritual power will be destroyed.

original: bskul bar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i dus su rang gi spyi bor snyoms par zhugs pa'i mgon po dpal bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun rnams kyis dbang🔽bskur ba yang dang yang du bsam pa ste /🔽sngags rnams nyid ni thams cad la //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: bskul bar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i dus su rang gi spyi bor snyoms par zhugs pa'i mgon po dpal bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun rnams kyis dbang bskur ba yang dang yang du bsam pa ste / sngags rnams nyid ni thams cad la // rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
translated: The exhortation is the repeated consecration of the stream of bodhicitta by the Lord of all Tathagatas, the Great Blissful Lord, who enters into union on one's crown at the time of accomplishing all powers.🔽It is also explained as all mantras themselves

original: zhes kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: are meditated on as Vajrasattva.

original: yang na @248a * //
analyzed: yang na @248a * //
translated: Or else,

original: yi ge h'um skabs skabs su brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yi ge h'um skabs skabs su brjod par bya ste /
translated: one should recite the syllable hūṃ from time to time,

original: mchog dang po'i snying po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog dang po'i snying po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the essence of the supreme first [buddha] is the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: de ltar na mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the desired result will certainly be accomplished.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'phags ma ral pa gcig ma'i gzugs rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par kun du rnam par 'phrul ba skyed par byed pa'i ye shes ni kun du rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'phags ma ral pa gcig ma'i gzugs rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par kun du rnam par 'phrul ba skyed par byed pa'i ye shes ni kun du rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes te /
translated: The wisdom that generates the emanations of the forms of Ekajaṭī, as many as there are atoms in all world systems, pervading the realm of space, is the wisdom of emanation.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyid pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyid pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on that is called “unimpeded” because it is unimpeded.

original: dam tshig chen po ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi zhes bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi zhes bya ba yin zhing /
translated: The great pledge is the noble nectar.

original: de dang yang dag par sbyor bas na /
analyzed: de dang yang dag par sbyor bas na /
translated: Since it is united with that,

original: dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog ste /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog ste /
translated: it is the great vajra pledge.

original: ral pa gcig ma de'o //
analyzed: ral pa gcig ma de'o //
translated: That is Ekajaṭī.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The others have been explained.

original: bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya //
analyzed: bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya //
translated: Having summoned, one should enjoy.

original: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su gyur par byas nas bdag nyid ral pa gcig ma kha spu ma gtogs pa phyag dang zhal la sogs pa rnams 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa ste
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni 'di skad du rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su gyur par byas nas bdag nyid ral pa gcig ma kha spu ma gtogs pa phyag dang zhal la sogs pa rnams 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa ste
translated: This is saying that having transformed yourself into Great Vajradhara, you imagine yourself as Ekajaṭī, except for the hair and beard, with the same faces, hands, and so forth as Ārya Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: / 'on kyang nu ma la sogs pa dang ldan zhing de dang snyoms par zhugs pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gsum pa dag gis chos kyi dar 'dzin par bsams la /🔽rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag n'a ga ge sar dang bcas pas bud med kyi thod pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i klu'i bu mo snying gar sngags bkod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bris te bkug la /
analyzed: / 'on kyang nu ma la sogs pa dang ldan zhing de dang snyoms par zhugs pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gsum pa dag gis chos kyi dar 'dzin par bsams la / rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag n'a ga ge sar dang bcas pas bud med kyi thod pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i klu'i bu mo snying gar sngags bkod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bris te bkug la /
translated: However, you have breasts and so forth, and you are in union with him, holding a Dharma conch with your three right and three left hands.🔽With the blood of your left ring finger and saffron, draw a nāga girl in the heart of a woman’s skull on a wind mandala, with the mantra array as before.

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i ral gri'i lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i ral gri'i lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
translated: Summon her and press her down with your left foot, which has a sword-topped iron hook.

original: bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod cing bkug la /
analyzed: bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod cing bkug la /
translated: Having summoned with the mantra along with the urging,

original: nye bar longs spyod par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: one should enjoy the near enjoyment.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dam tshig ni dpal bde ba chen po yin zhing /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dam tshig ni dpal bde ba chen po yin zhing /
translated: The pledge of space is glorious great bliss,

original: de las byung bas nam mkha'i dam tshig byung ba ste /
analyzed: de las byung bas nam mkha'i dam tshig byung ba ste /
translated: and since it arises from that, it is the arising of the pledge of space.

original: 'phags ma khro gnyer can yin zhing de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags ma khro gnyer can yin zhing de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The noble Bhrukuṭī is the concentration focused on that, and it is called that because of its indivisibility.

original: chos chen po'i dam tshig ni dpal padma mthar byed de de dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos chen po'i dam tshig ni dpal padma mthar byed de de dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: The pledge of great Dharma is glorious Padmanarteśvara, and one is endowed with that.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The others have been explained.🔽Summoning with the pledge, etc.

original: dam tshig la @248b sogs pa yis dgug / ces bya bas ni 'di skad du bdag nyid 'das ma thag pa bzhin dpal rta mgrin gyi rnam pa can gyi 'phags ma khro gnyer can de dang ldan par bsams la /
