analyzed: bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya //
translated: women in the four places.

original: zhes bya ba spyan la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
analyzed: zhes bya ba spyan la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
translated: In the places of Locana and so forth,

original: de dag gi gzugs su rnam par bsgoms pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i bu mo bzhi bzhag la /
analyzed: de dag gi gzugs su rnam par bsgoms pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i bu mo bzhi bzhag la /
translated: one should place the four girls as explained, contemplated as their forms.

original: sme sha can gyi bu mo kun du bzang mor lhag par mos par byas nas /
analyzed: sme sha can gyi bu mo kun du bzang mor lhag par mos par byas nas /
translated: Having generated the conviction that the outcaste girl is Samantabhadra,

original: de'i padmar rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje bcug ste /
analyzed: de'i padmar rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje bcug ste /
translated: one inserts one's secret vajra into her lotus.

original: las la gnas par gyur nas /
analyzed: las la gnas par gyur nas /
translated: Having remained in the action,

original: 'dod chags chen po'i mthus gnyis ka yang zhu bar gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i mthus gnyis ka yang zhu bar gyur te /
translated: through the power of great passion, both melt.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsams la /
translated: One should imagine the form of the moon mandala of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de la yang yi ge h'um kha dog dkar po mgo gyen du bltas pa yongs su gyur par byas nas /
analyzed: de la yang yi ge h'um kha dog dkar po mgo gyen du bltas pa yongs su gyur par byas nas /
translated: And on that, one should imagine a white syllable hūṃ, its head turned upward, and transform it.

original: 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsams te /
analyzed: 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsams te /
translated: One should imagine a great Vajradhara blazing with five-colored light, consecrated by the three seed syllables.

original: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i gtos khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la kun du reg nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam par byas te bsdus nas rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la kun du bcug ste
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i gtos khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la kun du reg nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam par byas te bsdus nas rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la kun du bcug ste
translated: The mass of light rays that emerge from that touch the Tathāgatas and so forth that pervade the vault of the sky, and having transformed them into the form of Great Vajradhara, one should gather them and cause them to enter one’s body, speech, and mind.

original: / bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: / bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on oneself as Great Vajradhara.

original: bsgom pa 'dis mtshan ma thob pas myur du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mngon par byang chub pa thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgom pa 'dis mtshan ma thob pas myur du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mngon par byang chub pa thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
translated: By this meditation, one will quickly attain the manifest enlightenment of Great Vajradhara, having obtained the signs.

original: rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Resplendent like Vairocana,

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni sngar bshad pa yin zhing /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni sngar bshad pa yin zhing /
translated: Vairocana has been explained above.

original: 'di la de dang 'dra ba'i 'od yod pas na rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra ste /
analyzed: 'di la de dang 'dra ba'i 'od yod pas na rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra ste /
translated: Since he has a radiance like that, he is resplendent like Vairocana.

original: dpal rdo rje 'chang sku mdog dkar po'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje 'chang sku mdog dkar po'o //
translated: Glorious Vajradhara is white in color.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal po che'o //
translated: He is the great king because he is the lord of all the tathagatas.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i chos kyi sku la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang / sku rdo rje la sogs pa 'dzin par mdzad pa'i phyir sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i chos kyi sku la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang / sku rdo rje la sogs pa 'dzin par mdzad pa'i phyir sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: He is the buddha, the holder of the three vajra bodies, because he holds the dharmakaya and so forth, as explained above, and because he holds the vajra body and so forth.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed cing 'byin pa yod pa de nyid mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed cing 'byin pa yod pa de nyid mi phyed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That samadhi in which the previously explained Vajrasattva is generated and emanated is called that because it is indivisible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar po dpal zhe sdang rdo rje'i gdan la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar po dpal zhe sdang rdo rje'i gdan la bri bar bya'o //
translated: For that reason, first of all, one should draw Great Vajradhara, white in color, on the seat of glorious Hatred Vajra.

original: gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar @257a * //
analyzed: gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar @257a * //
translated: Having taken it from the secret place, one should eat it.

original: bya ; / zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du 'phags pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: bya ; / zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du 'phags pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing /
translated: As before, endowed with the yoga of Noble Mañjuvajra,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i bu mo dang lhan cig rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas phyi rol gyi sems can gyi tshogs med pa'i gnas su rten dang bcas pa'i brten pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pas mi snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya bar lhag par mos
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i bu mo dang lhan cig rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas phyi rol gyi sems can gyi tshogs med pa'i gnas su rten dang bcas pa'i brten pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pas mi snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya bar lhag par mos
translated: one should practice the spiritual discipline of knowledge together with the girl as explained, and in a place devoid of external crowds, one should imagine that one is in the center of the supporting and supported wheels, and one should actualize the meditative absorption of invisibility.

original: pa'i sgo nas gsang ba'i mchod pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'od zer 'bar ba'i padma na gnas pa khas blangs te /
analyzed: pa'i sgo nas gsang ba'i mchod pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'od zer 'bar ba'i padma na gnas pa khas blangs te /
translated: Through the door of imagination, one should take the bodhicitta that arises from the secret offering, which is located in the lotus of blazing light rays,

original: rig ma la yang rang gi kha nas phyung ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rig ma la yang rang gi kha nas phyung ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: and one should give it to the knowledge woman from one’s own mouth.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'bras bu gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'bras bu gsungs so //
translated: The result is stated by “that” and so forth.

original: bza' ba ni 'bras kyi bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni 'bras kyi bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Food is rice, cakes, and so forth.

original: bshad pa dang / rta dang glang po'i sha la sogs pa ni bza' ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa dang / rta dang glang po'i sha la sogs pa ni bza' ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: The explanation is that horse, elephant, and human flesh and so forth are not food.

original: gzhug par bya zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: gzhug par bya zhes bya bas ni /
translated: “One should eat” is stated.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching:

original: rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad cing mi snang ba bsgrub pa la mtshan ma thob pas snod du rung ba gnyis bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug ste /
analyzed: rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad cing mi snang ba bsgrub pa la mtshan ma thob pas snod du rung ba gnyis bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug ste /
translated: One who has practiced the vidyā conduct and obtained the signs for the accomplishment of invisibility, having caused two suitable ones to draw the maṇḍala for the accomplishment,

original: de'i dbus su rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par zhugs pas snga ma bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bshad ma thag pa'i bza' ba la sogs pa bcug ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par zhugs pas snga ma bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bshad ma thag pa'i bza' ba la sogs pa bcug ste /
translated: in the center of that, having entered into union with the yoga of one’s deity, as before, one should place the just-explained food and so forth, which are the articles of worship.

original: yi ge gsum mam rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas zos na ji skad bshad pa bzhi ni du 'grub par 'gyur bas de'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge gsum mam rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas zos na ji skad bshad pa bzhi ni du 'grub par 'gyur bas de'i phyir //
translated: Having enchanted them one hundred and eight times with the three syllables or one’s mantra, if one eats them, one will accomplish the four just explained. Therefore:

original: zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong //
analyzed: zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong //
translated: “If one eats, one will not be seen by the buddhas.”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bshad ba cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽bshang ba yang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga kho na bzhin du kham phor so ma btang ba'i kha sbyar bar bzhag ste /
analyzed: bshad ba cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / bshang ba yang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga kho na bzhin du kham phor so ma btang ba'i kha sbyar bar bzhag ste /
translated: The explanation is according to the rite, etc.🔽The explanation is also just according to the rite that was just explained.

original: mngon par bzlas la bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par bzlas la bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One should eat the human flesh, having placed it in a joined pair of unfired pots, and having enchanted it.

original: thugs rjes dmar ba nyid dang ye shes kyis snang bar mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid nyi ma yin pas na sangs rgyas nyi ma ste /
analyzed: thugs rjes dmar ba nyid dang ye shes kyis snang bar mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid nyi ma yin pas na sangs rgyas nyi ma ste /
translated: Since the Buddha is the sun because of being red with compassion and because of illuminating with intuition, he is the Buddha-sun.

original: de rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Even they do not see it, is what is meant.

original: de bzhin khyi'i sha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba kham phor kha sbyar na gnas pa zos na yang 'bras bu de dang 'dra ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin khyi'i sha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba kham phor kha sbyar na gnas pa zos na yang 'bras bu de dang 'dra ba kho na'o //
translated: Likewise, if one eats any of the dog flesh, etc., placed in a joined pair of pots, the result is just the same.

original: bshang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin du bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi rigs kyi bu mo dang snyoms par zhugs pas bdud rtsi lnga ma sha phyed @257b bshang
analyzed: bshang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin du bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi rigs kyi bu mo dang snyoms par zhugs pas bdud rtsi lnga ma sha phyed @257b bshang
translated: The excrement, etc.,🔽is as just explained.🔽In the center of the maṇḍala to be drawn, through the yoga of any deity, one should enter into union with a daughter of one’s own family.🔽

original: ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rdzas ma sha phyed dang lhan cig sbyar te /
analyzed: ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rdzas ma sha phyed dang lhan cig sbyar te /
translated: The “feces” and so forth indicate that, as just explained, one should practice union with a daughter of one’s own clan, any deity abiding in the center of the maṇḍala as just explained, and the five nectars, any substance such as half a human corpse, feces, and so forth, combined together.

original: snga ma bzhin du lcags gsum gyis dkris la padmar bzhag la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du lcags gsum gyis dkris la padmar bzhag la /
translated: As before, one should wrap it in the three metals, place it in the lotus,

original: de'i nang na gnas pa'i rang gi bdag po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis bsgoms na de kho na bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de'i nang na gnas pa'i rang gi bdag po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis bsgoms na de kho na bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
translated: and meditate on one’s lord abiding within it through the process of emanating and reabsorbing. It is taught that one will be just like him.

original: thun mong nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /🔽rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung //
analyzed: thun mong nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir / rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung //
translated: In order to teach that this is common,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: “any vajra holder” and so forth is stated.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes par zad do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes par zad do //
translated: This is understood.

original: steng du rang gi ye shes kyi mthus dpag tshad bye ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi bar du 'gro bas na rdo rje 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: steng du rang gi ye shes kyi mthus dpag tshad bye ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi bar du 'gro bas na rdo rje 'gro ba'o //
translated: The vajra-goer is so called because it goes up to the three-thousandfold world systems, as many as there are sand particles in the Ganges River, by the power of one's intuition.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The others have been explained.

original: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i mi snang ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i mi snang ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the procedure of the unseen which is not to be transgressed,

original: dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen po de dpal rdo rje 'chang do //
analyzed: dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen po de dpal rdo rje 'chang do //
translated: the Blessed One is the great vajra of the unseen pledge, glorious Vajradhara.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i tshogs bstan pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad par rtogs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i tshogs bstan pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad par rtogs nas /
translated: Having understood that the Blessed One accomplishes the welfare of sentient beings by teaching the assembly of various accomplishments,

original: rab tu dgyes shing spyan gdangs pas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rab tu dgyes shing spyan gdangs pas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he, with a mind of great joy and eyes wide open, utters this exclamation: Amazing! and so forth.

original: rigs nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi zlos gar bstan pa'i phyir dga' ba phul du byung ba nyid kyi sems 'khrul ba'o //
analyzed: rigs nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi zlos gar bstan pa'i phyir dga' ba phul du byung ba nyid kyi sems 'khrul ba'o //
translated: The mind of great joy is the delusion of the mind of the highest joy, in order to demonstrate the play of sentient beings of fixed spiritual gene.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The others have been explained.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the passage beginning Amazing! and so forth,

original: 'di dag rab tu ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo dang yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dus 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di dag rab tu ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo dang yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dus 'di'o //
translated: These are very wondrous in the sense that they are the time for the accomplishment of the powers of the girls of the family, etc., and the perfect union, etc.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyis zag pa med pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyis zag pa med pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The unchanging secret is so called because it is the means of attaining the uncontaminated bliss by means of method and wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure by nature for that very reason.

original: lus dang rtogs pa'i chos dri ma med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shin tu dri med chos so //
analyzed: lus dang rtogs pa'i chos dri ma med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shin tu dri med chos so //
translated: It is the immaculate Dharma because it is the stainless Dharma of the body and realization.

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi dbang bskur gyi nges pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi dbang bskur gyi nges pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the certainty of the consecration of the Buddhas, etc.,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, Then, etc.

original: ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The teacher, etc., has been explained.

original: yongs su dag pa'i sku can nyid yin pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i sku can nyid yin pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it has a completely pure body.

original: mi phyed pa'i thugs mnga' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i thugs mnga' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is vajra because it has an indivisible mind.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i gsung sgrogs pas che ba nyid yin pa'i phyir chos chen po ste /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i gsung sgrogs pas che ba nyid yin pa'i phyir chos chen po ste /
translated: It is the Great Dharma because it is the Greatness that proclaims the unerring teaching.

original: de lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das de rdo rje gsung @258a * //
analyzed: de lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das de rdo rje gsung @258a * //
translated: That Bhagavat who possesses such special qualities is the Vajra Speech.

original: bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bka' stsal to //
translated: He spoke.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The hero, etc.

original: sems dpa' ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The hero is glorious Vajrasattva,

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the cause of the arising of all heroes, such as the Buddhas.

original: dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las kyang /
analyzed: dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las kyang /
translated: And in the Shri Paramārtha-saṃgraha,

original: sems dpa' chen po de nyid las //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po de nyid las //
translated: From that very great hero

original: sems dpa' thams cad kun du 'byung //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sems dpa' thams cad kun du 'byung // zhes gsungs so //
translated: all heroes arise.

original: de'i shes rab nyid ni rdo rje yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i shes rab nyid ni rdo rje yin zhing /
translated: His wisdom is the vajra.

original: kun du bzang mo sku mdog dkar po lha mo'i gzugs can yin te /
analyzed: kun du bzang mo sku mdog dkar po lha mo'i gzugs can yin te /
translated: Samantabhadrā is white in color and has the form of a goddess.

original: dpal bde mchog phyi ma las kyang /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog phyi ma las kyang /
translated: And in the Shri Paramadya,

original: zla ba lta bur dag pa'i blo //
analyzed: zla ba lta bur dag pa'i blo //
translated: The mind that is pure like the moon

original: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: is called the vajra.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //🔽de yang dag par sbyor ba ni //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro // de yang dag par sbyor ba ni //
translated: Because it is said:🔽The union of the vajra

original: sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste //🔽de mnyes par 'gyur ro //🔽gang dag ce na /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste // de mnyes par 'gyur ro // gang dag ce na /
translated: is the union of the hero and the heroine.🔽The hero is the bodhisattva, and the heroine is the wisdom consort.🔽The union of the hero and the heroine is the union of the bodhisattva and the wisdom consort.

original: gsungs pa / sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin te /
analyzed: gsungs pa / sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin te /
translated: The hero is the bodhisattva, and the heroine is the wisdom consort.🔽The union of the hero and the heroine is the union of the bodhisattva and the wisdom consort.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //🔽ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so // ji ltar zhe na /

original: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni //

original: de nyid ni /

analyzed: so la khus gsher ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //

original: lingga zhes bya ba ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang dug dang khrag rnams las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: lingga zhes bya ba ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang dug dang khrag rnams las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
translated: The liṅga is an effigy made from human bone ash, poison, and blood.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The rest is explained.

original: srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za //
analyzed: srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za //
translated: There is no doubt that he will be carried off by the Rākṣasa.

original: zhes bya ba ni che ge mo raksha @261b seer gra ha yed ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags khro ba dang bcas pas bzlas na gdon mi za bar rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs pa yang khyer bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni che ge mo raksha @261b seer gra ha yed ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags khro ba dang bcas pas bzlas na gdon mi za bar rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs pa yang khyer bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: This means that if one recites the mantra with the words of invocation such as So-and-so rakṣa graha, then even one who is equal to Vajrasattva will certainly be carried off.

original: // ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis //
analyzed: // ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis //
translated: With mustard seed and excrement,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag ste 'on kyang ske tshe gtso bor gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag ste 'on kyang ske tshe gtso bor gyur ba'o //
translated: as explained immediately before, but with mustard seed as the primary ingredient.

original: tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur //
analyzed: tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur //
translated: He will be struck by great heat,

original: zhes bya ba ni chen mo zhes bskul ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chen mo zhes bskul ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: by the power of invoking Mahā.

original: sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba //
translated: Since it is not to be done with any other application,

original: zhes gang bshad pa de'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa de'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the mantra for that, he says,

original: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: beginning with In that case, this is...

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i khro bo ni 'phags pa bdud tshig chen po'i khro bo ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i khro bo ni 'phags pa bdud tshig chen po'i khro bo ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi bya ba ste /
translated: The great wrathful one of the commitments of all the Tathagatas is the noble nectar wrathful one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' sgrub bar byed pa dang / de rnams kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' sgrub bar byed pa dang / de rnams kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he accomplishes the words of all the Tathagatas and is not to be transgressed by them.

original: de'i snying po ni sngags so //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni sngags so //
translated: His essence is the mantra.

original: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: The so-called burnt offering is the one just explained.

original: yang na bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Or else, the so-called meditation is the one to be explained.

original: gzhan ni go sla'o //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni go sla'o // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽The so-called Vajrasattva is the Great Vajradhara explained above.

original: khro bo che zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbyung ba dang gzhug pa'i sgo nas yongs su gyur ba'i khro bo bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i gzugs can mo //
analyzed: khro bo che zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbyung ba dang gzhug pa'i sgo nas yongs su gyur ba'i khro bo bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i gzugs can mo //
translated: The so-called great wrathful one is the one called nectar wrathful one, who is the transformation of the noble nectar churned by the process of summoning and entering.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta ste /
translated: Therefore, he is the one who has the stare of a fearful, fearful one.

original: rnam par bgrad pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam par bgrad pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the stare, etc. has been explained.

original: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni lag na sta re dang tho ba thogs pa'i bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni lag na sta re dang tho ba thogs pa'i bsgrub bya'o //
translated: Having contemplated means the one to be accomplished, holding an axe and a hammer in his hands.

original: bsam gtan rab tu bya zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rab tu bya zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One should perform the meditation means as will be explained.

original: sems can drag po chen po gzhom pa'i phyir khro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: sems can drag po chen po gzhom pa'i phyir khro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge of the great fierce one's wrath is the cause of the arising of wrath in order to subdue the great fierce beings.

original: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: Space means the realm of space.

original: skabs 'dir yongs su gang ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'o //
analyzed: skabs 'dir yongs su gang ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'o //
translated: In this context, completely filled means completely filled with Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: gdug pa de yis bsad par ni //
analyzed: gdug pa de yis bsad par ni //
translated: One should imagine that the fierce one slays them,

original: zhes bya ba ni sta re dang tho ba lag na thogs pas gtubs shing bcad de phye mar byas par bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sta re dang tho ba lag na thogs pas gtubs shing bcad de phye mar byas par bsam pa'o //
translated: means that one imagines that the fierce one, holding an axe and a hammer in his hands, chops, cuts, and pulverizes them.

original: de ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan la sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya @262a * //
analyzed: de ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan la sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya @262a * //
translated: Immediately means that immediately after the yoga of concentration that will be explained, one will die, and become like Vajradhara.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams ni //
translated: The enemies who harm the buddhas

original: sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na //
analyzed: sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na //
translated: are imagined in front by the mantra practitioner.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams bsad pas 'gyod pa skyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams bsad pas 'gyod pa skyes pa /
translated: one who has regret from killing the buddhas and so forth,

original: skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs pa zhes bya ba dmyal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pas myos par gyur ba /
analyzed: skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs pa zhes bya ba dmyal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pas myos par gyur ba /
translated: is disturbed by fear and terror, meaning one is crazed by the fear of falling into hell.

original: mgon med cing skyabs med pa /
analyzed: mgon med cing skyabs med pa /
translated: One is without a protector and without refuge,

original: gcer bu skra bshig pa /
analyzed: gcer bu skra bshig pa /
translated: naked, with disheveled hair,

original: lus la til mar bskus pa /
analyzed: lus la til mar bskus pa /
translated: one's body smeared with sesame oil.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin sam po ta dbye ba byas te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin sam po ta dbye ba byas te /
translated: One should open the corpse as explained before,

original: me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: and imagine it standing in the middle of a fire mandala.

original: de la phan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir khro bo'i tshul du gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i khro bo 'phags pa bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod sbyin la sogs pa spros pa rnams kyis kun du sngangs
analyzed: de la phan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir khro bo'i tshul du gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i khro bo 'phags pa bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod sbyin la sogs pa spros pa rnams kyis kun du sngangs
translated: In order to benefit them, the wrathful one who is in the center of the maṇḍala of the assembly of deities, possessing the yoga of the wrathful noble amṛta, emanates yakṣa and so on, and they all tremble.

original: par byas te zos par bsam zhing /
analyzed: par byas te zos par bsam zhing /
translated: In order to benefit them, one should imagine that the wrathful Ārya Amṛta, who is in the center of the maṇḍala of wrathful deities, who is endowed with the yoga of wrath, frightens the yakṣas and so forth, who are emanated, and devours them.

original: de'i rnam par shes pa yang snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpar bskyed la /
analyzed: de'i rnam par shes pa yang snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpar bskyed la /
translated: One should generate their consciousnesses as bodhisattvas in the form of Akṣobhya, as before,

original: mngon par dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi gnas la yang dag par bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi gnas la yang dag par bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: and establish them in the state of the kingdom of Dharma, which is located in the world Abhirati, and confer the empowerment.

original: sbrul nag ces bya ba la sogs pa la gshin rje'i gzugs can gyis 'chi bdag gi bdud kyang 'jigs par byed pas na 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul nag ces bya ba la sogs pa la gshin rje'i gzugs can gyis 'chi bdag gi bdud kyang 'jigs par byed pas na 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa'o //
translated: “The black snake” and so forth. Since one who has the form of Yama frightens even the lord of death, he is “frightening even to the fearful.”

original: dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The pledge of supreme poison is as follows:

original: yi ge nam las klu rigs ldan gyi gzugs bung ba ltar sngo ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge nam las klu rigs ldan gyi gzugs bung ba ltar sngo ba'o //
translated: From the syllable nam comes the form of a nāga, blue like a bee.

original: nam mkha' na gnas pa'i yi ge hri las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis bkug pa'i khams gsum gyi dug gis gang bar bsams la /
analyzed: nam mkha' na gnas pa'i yi ge hri las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis bkug pa'i khams gsum gyi dug gis gang bar bsams la /
translated: From the syllable hrīḥ in space, hooks of light rays summon the poisons of the three realms, which fill the skull cup.

original: che ge mo'i dbral ba nas zo zhig ces de la bka' bsgo ste /
analyzed: che ge mo'i dbral ba nas zo zhig ces de la bka' bsgo ste /
translated: Summoning them with the words Eat so-and-so's poison,

original: des de zos par bsam zhing de'i rnam par shes pa yang 'das ma thag pa bzhin du mi bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: des de zos par bsam zhing de'i rnam par shes pa yang 'das ma thag pa bzhin du mi bskyod par bya'o //
translated: imagine that he eats it, and his consciousness is like that of one who has just died, and is unmoving.

original: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi nyams la sogs pa bkug ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi nyams la sogs pa bkug ste /
translated: Summon the life-essences of all sentient beings of the ten directions,

original: de kho na bzhin du bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and just like that, insert them into the body of the victim.

original: tho ba ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i tho ba 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: tho ba ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i tho ba 'bar ba'o //
translated: The hammer is a blazing hammer that arises from the syllable hūṃ.

original: gzhan ni shes par zad do //
analyzed: gzhan ni shes par zad do //
translated: The rest is clear.

original: gshegs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag na sta re la sogs pa bsnams pa'i rdo rje khro bo la sogs pa rnams kyis @262b rnam par bsgyel te dum bur gtubs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: gshegs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag na sta re la sogs pa bsnams pa'i rdo rje khro bo la sogs pa rnams kyis @262b rnam par bsgyel te dum bur gtubs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: With “crushing” and so forth, one should imagine that Vajra Wrath and so forth, holding axes and so forth in their hands, crush them to pieces.

original: bsrung ba la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: bsrung ba la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: With “protection” and so forth, it is taught as follows.

original: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying ga nas phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa phyung ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying ga nas phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa phyung ste /
translated: As before, one should emanate from one’s heart Vajrapāṇi holding a hook.

original: des de'i bsrung ba kha sbyar la sogs pa dang lha rnams bkug la rang gi bar shva g-yon par bzhag ste /
analyzed: des de'i bsrung ba kha sbyar la sogs pa dang lha rnams bkug la rang gi bar shva g-yon par bzhag ste /
translated: With that, one should summon the protection circle and so forth of the deities and place them in the left side of one’s mouth.

original: 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur bu nyid kyis aom gha gha zhes bya ba'i sngags /
analyzed: 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur bu nyid kyis aom gha gha zhes bya ba'i sngags /
translated: Then, with the kīla of noble Amṛtakuṇḍali, one should recite the mantra oṃ gha gha and so forth.

original: sarba dusht'am sarba p'a pam zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis bzhag la /
analyzed: sarba dusht'am sarba p'a pam zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis bzhag la /
translated: One should insert the two phrases “all evil” and “all sins.”

original: 'di'i sarba raksha aa ti mantr'am dee ba t'am shtsaktsi la yed /
analyzed: 'di'i sarba raksha aa ti mantr'am dee ba t'am shtsaktsi la yed /
translated: Here, one should insert “all protection” and “all mantras.”

original: ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa brjod cing phur bus gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa brjod cing phur bus gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that one should recite the words of urging, and should strike with the dagger.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for this, etc.,

original: gsod pa thams cad las gtso bor gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsod par byed pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: gsod pa thams cad las gtso bor gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsod par byed pa'i mchog go //
translated: it is the supreme killer because it is the chief of all killers.

original: bsrung ba la sogs pa'i kha sbyar dbye ba ni dam tshig ste 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsrung ba la sogs pa'i kha sbyar dbye ba ni dam tshig ste 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The pledge is the separation of the union of protection, etc. , because it is not to be transgressed.

original: rdo rje phung pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje phung pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for the vajra aggregates, etc.,

original: mi phyed pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can te /
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can te /
translated: it is a sentient being possessing the indivisible aggregates, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad khro zhing gdug pa gsod pa la gcig tu brtson par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad khro zhing gdug pa gsod pa la gcig tu brtson par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should think that all of them, as many as there are, abiding in the wrathful mandala of the Tathagatas, etc. , are wrathful and fierce, intent on killing, and united.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min //
analyzed: mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min //
translated: they are pleased, not otherwise.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa de kho na bzhin du bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i rnal byor pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa de kho na bzhin du bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i rnal byor pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, the Tathāgatas, etc. are pleased with the yogi/nī who is intent on accomplishing just what has been explained.

original: gzhan du phyin log gi bsam pas byed pa la ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du phyin log gi bsam pas byed pa la ma yin pa'o //
translated: But not with one who acts with a perverted attitude.

original: ston pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ston pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The teacher is the Buddha, etc.

original: chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas na sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas na sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the Buddha because he has realized all dharmas.

original: de nyid des par 'byed pa'i shes rab lha mo'i rnam par gyur par 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid des par 'byed pa'i shes rab lha mo'i rnam par gyur par 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: He is the Vajra Holder because he holds the wisdom which is the differentiation of reality in the form of a goddess.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'chos par mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'chos par mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because he is the one who creates the Tathāgatas, etc.

original: rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Vajra Dharma is Amitābha.

original: 'khor lo can ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: 'khor lo can ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The one with the wheel is Vairocana.

original: de rnams kyi rnal 'byor lhur len pa'i sgrub pa po rnams de'i ming can du bstan to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnal 'byor lhur len pa'i sgrub pa po rnams de'i ming can du bstan to //
translated: The yogi/nī who is intent on them is taught to have their names.

original: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: This is an illustration.

original: lha sgom pa po rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: lha sgom pa po rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Also, those who meditate on the deity should be seized.

original: de rnams kyang sdig pa @263a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyang sdig pa @263a * //
translated: And those who have accumulated evil

original: bsags shing bsrung ba la sogs pa dang phral nas bsam gtan gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas nges par sbyar na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsags shing bsrung ba la sogs pa dang phral nas bsam gtan gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas nges par sbyar na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: should be killed by separating them from protection, etc., and by applying any of the meditations, the meaning of which is that they will be killed.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The others have been explained.

original: sems can khro bo chen po gzhan rnams gzhom pa'i phyir 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing mi phyed pa'i khro bo ston par mdzad pa'i khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bo'o //
analyzed: sems can khro bo chen po gzhan rnams gzhom pa'i phyir 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing mi phyed pa'i khro bo ston par mdzad pa'i khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bo'o //
translated: For the sake of conquering other sentient beings who are great wrathful ones, the great wrathful one who displays the indestructible, unconquerable wrath is the pledge-vajra of great wrath.

original: de ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rtog pa'o //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rtog pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: This is the imagination of Amṛtakuṇḍali.🔽Then, etc.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

translated: This is to say that one should generate the wrathful form of any of the three families, such as the eternal one, etc. , which is the supported, together with the support, blue in color, arisen from the creation stage,

original: rdzogs par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: rdzogs par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
translated: Having contemplated the nature of oneself as complete,

original: de kho na bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa khro bo spros pa'i sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu kun du khyab par byas te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa khro bo spros pa'i sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu kun du khyab par byas te /
translated: just like that, one should contemplate the clouds of wrathful emanations of Vairocana, etc., pervading all ten directions.🔽One should contemplate that by the power of those, the bodies, speech, and minds of those to be subdued are pulverized, and that by the recitation of one's mantra, one's weapon in one's hand burns them to ashes.

original: de rnams kyi nad kyis lus dang ngag dang sems phye mar brlag par blta ba dang / rang gi sngags brjod pas rang gi lag na gnas pa'i mtshon cha 'bar bas kyang thal bar byas par bsam zhing thun bzhir lan brgya rtsa brgyad zlos pas gzhom par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de rnams kyi nad kyis lus dang ngag dang sems phye mar brlag par blta ba dang / rang gi sngags brjod pas rang gi lag na gnas pa'i mtshon cha 'bar bas kyang thal bar byas par bsam zhing thun bzhir lan brgya rtsa brgyad zlos pas gzhom par bya ba dang /
translated: One should contemplate that by reciting one hundred and eight times in four sessions, one will subdue.

original: yang bdag nyid mdog dkar po zhi ba'i dang can du dmigs la ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spros pa'i zhi ba'i ngang can dkar po phan 'dogs par zhugs pa de rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du bum pa'i ye shes kyi chu dang /
analyzed: yang bdag nyid mdog dkar po zhi ba'i dang can du dmigs la ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spros pa'i zhi ba'i ngang can dkar po phan 'dogs par zhugs pa de rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du bum pa'i ye shes kyi chu dang /
translated: Again, one should visualize oneself as white and peaceful, and just like that, the white peaceful ones emanated should be engaged in benefiting. One should contemplate that by those, just like before, the wisdom water of the vase, etc.,

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun dang zhu bar gyur ba'i sgo nas bdag nyid zhugs pa'i dbang bskur ba byas na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun dang zhu bar gyur ba'i sgo nas bdag nyid zhugs pa'i dbang bskur ba byas na /
translated: If one enters oneself and bestows initiation by means of the stream of enlightenment spirit and the melting,

original: zhag bdun gyis las las byung ba'i nad thams cad kyang nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes @265a * //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyis las las byung ba'i nad thams cad kyang nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes @265a * //
translated: all diseases arisen from karma will certainly be thoroughly pacified within seven days.

original: bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: yang na bdag gi sngags kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshul de kho na bzhin du dkon mchog dpal la sogs pa rang gi lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang gzhom par bya'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: yang na bdag gi sngags kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshul de kho na bzhin du dkon mchog dpal la sogs pa rang gi lha gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang gzhom par bya'o zhes bstan to //
translated: Or, by means of one's own mantra, etc., in the same way, one should conquer by means of the yoga of any of one's own deities, such as Ratnaprabha.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes par zad do //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes par zad do //
translated: This is understood.

original: bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la dga' ba rnams kyis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnams rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la dga' ba rnams kyis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnams rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur bas /
translated: Since those who delight in recitation and contemplation will see the signs of power in dreams,

original: de'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: therefore, the Bhagavān declares, thereupon, etc.

original: rmi lam gyi mtshan ma'i ye shes kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub pa bkug pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi rgyud kun du snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ye shes skye ba 'od po che'o //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi mtshan ma'i ye shes kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub pa bkug pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi rgyud kun du snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ye shes skye ba 'od po che'o //
translated: The great light of the arising of intuition is so called because it is the intuition of the dream sign, which, by the process of summoning the power of the desired spiritual attainments, illuminates the mind streams of all sentient beings.

original: 'dod dang thar ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod dang thar ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Desire and liberation.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi yab dang yum yang dag par sbyor ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod dang thar ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi yab dang yum yang dag par sbyor ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod dang thar ba ste /
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva, who is the nature of the union of the father and mother of method and wisdom in order to generate passion in those who are free of passion, is desire and liberation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The Lord has said:

original: chags bral shin tu chags byed phyir //
analyzed: chags bral shin tu chags byed phyir //
translated: In order to generate passion in those free of passion,

original: nga ni gsang chen rab dga' yin //
analyzed: nga ni gsang chen rab dga' yin //
translated: I am the great secret, the highest joy.

original: 'dod pa ma gtogs bde chen med //
analyzed: 'dod pa ma gtogs bde chen med //
translated: There is no great bliss apart from desire.

original: nga 'di 'dod pa bde ba nga //
analyzed: nga 'di 'dod pa bde ba nga //
translated: This desire of mine is bliss.

original: yum ni shes rab yang dag bshad //
analyzed: yum ni shes rab yang dag bshad //
translated: The mother is said to be wisdom,

original: yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste //
translated: and the father is skillful in method.

original: de ni nye bar bstan byas na //
analyzed: de ni nye bar bstan byas na //
translated: Having been taught this,

original: 'dod dang thar pa rab 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod dang thar pa rab 'grub 'gyur //
translated: desire and liberation are perfectly accomplished.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid thams cad las phul du byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje che'o //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad las phul du byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje che'o //
translated: Since it is the most excellent of all, it is the great vajra.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is said is to be explained.

original: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste //
analyzed: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste //
translated: All phenomena are like a dream.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and the following,🔽all phenomena, which are forms and so forth, are internal and external. They are like a dream, merely appearing, and in reality, they are unborn.

original: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs la sogs pa mngon sum du gyur ba rnams rmi lam bzhin du snang ba tsam yin zhing de kho na nyid du ma skyes pa rnams la yang 'khrul pa'i ye shes rab tu gsungs
analyzed: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs la sogs pa mngon sum du gyur ba rnams rmi lam bzhin du snang ba tsam yin zhing de kho na nyid du ma skyes pa rnams la yang 'khrul pa'i ye shes rab tu gsungs
translated: The wisdom of error is taught.

original: so // bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: so // bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Meditation and so forth are easy to understand.

original: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Here, this and so forth,

original: rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
translated: the great dream commitment is

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: the cause that generates the desired result.

original: byang chub ye shes mchog ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: byang chub ye shes mchog ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos kyi sku'o //

original: sangs rgyas skyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas skyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the cause of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang po ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang po ste //

original: bdag nyid kyis de thob par rmi lam du @265b mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis de thob par rmi lam du @265b mthong bar 'gyur ro //

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The Buddha is Vairocana.

original: de'i rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis chos mnyan pa'i sgo nas langs spyad par bya ste der yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis chos mnyan pa'i sgo nas langs spyad par bya ste der yang ngo //

original: sems can chen po khams gsum pa //
analyzed: sems can chen po khams gsum pa //
translated: The great beings of the three realms

original: zhes bya ba rgyal chen rigs bzhi la sogs pa rnams dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas par mthong zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgyal chen rigs bzhi la sogs pa rnams dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas par mthong zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: bdag nyid la bla na med pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis so //
translated: One sees that they worship oneself with unsurpassed offerings and so forth.

analyzed: ye shes chen po'o 'od 'dra zhes bya ba ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi sprul pa'i sku'o //

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Having the form of Vajrasattva, etc.🔽Having the form of Vajradhara, etc., means having the form of any of the special deities, just as they were previously visualized in the three mandalas.

original: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yang rung ba 'das ma thag pa bzhin du sgu gsum gyi bdag nyid can bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yang rung ba 'das ma thag pa bzhin du sgu gsum gyi bdag nyid can bstan to //

analyzed: gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher // zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig ma dang snyoms par zhugs par ro //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are the bodhisattvas of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.

translated: The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.🔽The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.🔽The great heroines are the great heroines of the ten directions.🔽The great beings are the great beings of the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
translated: The great heroes are the great heroes of the ten directions.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The great heroines

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' thug pa med pa na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams mthong ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' thug pa med pa na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams mthong ba'o //
translated: The forms of the Buddhas dwelling in the Buddha-fields in the infinite world-realms in the ten directions.

original: stsol zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de rnams nyid thugs dgyes par gyur nas sgrub pa po de la zab cing rgya che ba'i don ston pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod do //
analyzed: stsol zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de rnams nyid thugs dgyes par gyur nas sgrub pa po de la zab cing rgya che ba'i don ston pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod do //
translated: The granting is the granting of the treasure of the sublime Dharma, which is the teaching of the profound and vast meaning, by those very Buddhas, who are delighted.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The wheel of Dharma is the wheel of the Dharma.

original: lus zhes bya ba ni bdag gi lus te /
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba ni bdag gi lus te /
translated: The body is one's own body.

original: rang gi lhag pa'i lha dang / 'phags pa'i gzugs dang / rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing gsung rab rnam par bshad par byed par ro //🔽bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pas te rang gi lha'i go 'phang la gnas pas so //
analyzed: rang gi lhag pa'i lha dang / 'phags pa'i gzugs dang / rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing gsung rab rnam par bshad par byed par ro // bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pas te rang gi lha'i go 'phang la gnas pas so //
translated: Surrounded by the superior deities, the noble forms, and the sentient beings who are in accord with oneself, one should explain the scriptures.

original: rnal 'byor dus su mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dus su mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: Abiding in the vajra of meditative concentration, abiding in the state of one's own deity, at the time of yoga one should see.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor goms par bya ba la zhugs pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor goms par bya ba la zhugs pa'i tshe'o //
translated: This is when one is engaged in cultivating yoga.

original: kun dga' ra ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes par zad do //🔽bsam gtan dus su @266a * //
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes par zad do // bsam gtan dus su @266a * //
translated: The pleasure grove and so forth are well known.🔽At the time of meditative concentration,

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi tshe'o //
translated: at the time of meditative concentration means at the time of meditative concentration.

original: de kho na bzhin du cung zad gnyid log par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du cung zad gnyid log par gyur pa na /
translated: In the same way, if one falls asleep a little,

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phung po la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phung po la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will see oneself blessed by all the Buddhas with the aggregates and so forth, consecrated by the Buddhas and so forth, and worshipped by the knowledge holders and so forth.

original: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni sgom pa'i ye shes las nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni sgom pa'i ye shes las nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The vajra-born is the one who arises from the wisdom of meditation.

original: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: The various is the one just explained.

original: nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o ;
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o ;
translated: It is stainless because it is the cause for the abandonment of the afflictive obstructions, the obstructions to omniscience, and the obstructions of birth and karma.

original: / bla med ces bya ba des 'dod pa'i lha'i go 'phang myur ba nyid du nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / bla med ces bya ba des 'dod pa'i lha'i go 'phang myur ba nyid du nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the word “unsurpassed” it is certain that the state of a desire realm god will be quickly accomplished.

original: gdol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gdol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “ Outcaste” and so forth.

original: gdol pa'i rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam /
analyzed: gdol pa'i rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam /
translated: The sons and daughters of the outcaste class,

original: khyi dang rgod ma la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga thogs pa rnams dang / bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs can yang dag par byung ba'i las kyis mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong ba'i rmi lam mthong bas ni sems kyi gnas te /
analyzed: khyi dang rgod ma la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga thogs pa rnams dang / bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs can yang dag par byung ba'i las kyis mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong ba'i rmi lam mthong bas ni sems kyi gnas te /
translated: and those who hold the five nectars, such as dogs, goats, and so forth, and one’s own form as Great Vajradhara, by the arising of the experience of supreme joy through the practice of the yoga of the creation stage, one sees a dream.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor grub cing yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor grub cing yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The place of the mind is the creation and perfection of the maṇḍala of the support and the supported.

original: da ni mtshan ma de la mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni mtshan ma de la mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to stop clinging to those signs,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “then” and so forth is stated.

original: dam tshig gi snying po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam tshig gi snying po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The essence of the commitments is

analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i nges pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: the certain knowledge that analyzes dreams that should not be transgressed.

original: rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With respect to “one’s own mind,” etc.,

original: dmigs pa nyid yin pas na dmigs pa ste nges par rtogs pa nyid yin zhing ;
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid yin pas na dmigs pa ste nges par rtogs pa nyid yin zhing ;
translated: that which is itself the object is the object, i.e., the ascertainment.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:
